reviews.text: We found this restaurant by chance as it was close to our Airbnb. Great experience on the first evening and it‚Äôs convenience meant we ended up eating there all 4 nights. Lovely location in a small quiet square overlooking a canal. We were lucky with the weather so were able to eat outside under the parasols, lit by candles and fairy lights, very relaxing and romantic. Blankets provided at each table was a nice touch, just in case you did feel chilly. Menu varied enough to allow us to try something different each night. Pasta and pizzas fantastic, even the burger was above average. Tirasimu was excellent. ‚ÄúRed‚Äù draft malt beer was great and my better half enjoyed the Bellini. All the staff were friendly, but Miguel in particular was really helpful and attentive, getting to know us and our tastes despite the language barrier. Well worth a visit if you fancy some great food away from the usual hustle and bustle.

We had been eating a lot of seafood so chose pasta this evening.  The lasagna was good but nothing special.  Hard to mess up this dish in Italy.  Food was not good enough to draw us back another evening during our week in Venice.  If convenient to where you are, and you are in the mood for very casual and scenic, this may be the spot for you.

We ended our weekend in Venice here and it was the perfect way to finish! The food was gorgeous, the menu was simple but varied and clear, and we could see it was an authentic kitchen. Sitting outside in the courtyard was peaceful and the ambience was lovely; we both agreed it was the best meal that we had had all weekend. 

The staff were friendly and helpful. They were only a bit put out by us splitting the bill on visa and didn‚Äôt want us to round things up to leave a tip. But this wasn‚Äôt the first time we experienced that in Venice. Overall, it was a fabulous place to eat and would highly recommend!

reviews.text:
Sur une petite place pr√®s d'une √©glise, se trouve cette pizzeria traditionnelle. La terrasse est sur un quai tr√®s pittoresque, entre 2 ponts. On est au calme et en plus, on y mange bien. Nous avons pris un Spritz (5 ‚Ç¨) et des pizzas (entre 12 et 15 ‚Ç¨). Le service est agr√©able et rapide. On mange en regardant passer les gondoles.

reviews.text: This had been recommended to us, and we were able to dine here twice during our visit.  The first time we enjoyed the pizzas for which they are well-known.  I especially enjoyed mine with Gorgonzola and sausage.  For the second visit we had penne and lasagne (veal and vegetables, which were both excellent.  There are some interesting desserts; we both enjoyed the "Pineapple Soup". There was a slight blip in the service on our second visit, but otherwise fine, not enough to prevent me from giving the full 5.

reviews.text: staying nearby we found this absolute gem on our fist night although we did,nt eat there that night. if you have not been here its in a small square with tables out side next to a quiet cana lwhich is perfect for lunch or dinner.we were in town for carnivale so evenings were cold and we went inside. the fist thing you see is the kitchen on your left which was spotlessly clean. the owners were very friendly and the menu excellent .we both chose the veal lasagne with vegetables.the inside is not very big and was nicely decorated and full of locals which is always a good omen. we chose red beer to drink as we have never seen it before and a good choice too.food was brought out shortly and looked very nice.it was bursting with flavour and a decent portion to boot. the accompanying fries were equally good and again a good size portion.we topped this feast off with tiramisu,simply amazing. overall it was such a good experience that we went back another evening for pizza and that too was great.overall i would say this is a great place to dine,good unhurried service reasonable prices for high quality food and well worth the visit. if i find myself in the area i would not hesitate to go back
reviews.title: best lasagne in santa croce

reviews.text: Having been raised as a youth in Venice, "Il Refolo" is where I enjoy festive evenings with family and friends, or business dinners with associates and colleagues "To Be Venetian". The atmosphere of the "alfresco" dining in the authentic "campo" with the light breeze ("refolo") passing through its space, is exquisite. The cuisine, which is prepared by the Venetian family which also owns the reknown "Il Fiore" restaurant nearby, while being moderately priced as compared to its notable neighbor, is equally exquisite.
reviews.title: To Be Venetian

Service tr√®s sympathique et rapide. Pizza et p√¢tes al refolo excellentes, la calzone est bonne pour les amateurs de mozzarella mais manque de sauce tomate, c'est le seul point n√©gatif.

reviews.title: Terrible experience

reviews.text:
Un eccellenza  veneziana nel cuore del Sestiere di Santa Croce. Il piccolo locale ha a disposizione il campo davanti all'attivit√† quale sala da pranzo unica nella sua eccezionale specificit√†.
Il campo √® situato tra l'alto campanile e la facciata della chiesa di San Giacomo dell'Orio (all'interno della quale vi √® una piccola pala d'altare di Giovan Battista Pittoni ...un vero gioiello rococ√≤) e un suggestivo rio solcato dalle gondole e impreziosito dai tipici ponticelli veneziani. L'ora indicata per usufruire di questo locale √® il crepuscolo quando tra il suono delle campane, il rosseggiare del cielo e le gondole su cui baritoni cantano brani della tradizione italiana si possono gustare piatti gustosi della tradizione contaminati da rielaborazioni moderne, oppure gustose pizze con verdure e frutti prettamente di stagione. Il personale √® professionale e il padrone di casa √® capace di metterti a tuo agio. Obbligatoria √® la prenotazione poich√© essendo un must veneziano non √® facile trovare tavoli liberi.
reviews.title: Degno di un set cinematografico. Per chi desidera una  Venezia al quadrato!

reviews.text: For all the diversity of it's menu, good selection of seafood and self-promotion, their approach to customer service is a bit of a 'let down'. Waiting staff are characterless and robotic. There is a tendency to cram customers together at tables within close proximity of one another -- allowing private conversations to be easily overheard between adjoining tables. I was thus 'squeezed in', while large areas of the canal-side dining space remained unoccupied with empty tables. Obviously, this suits the convenience of waiting staff when fetching things from the kitchen to the seated diners. But do Il Refolo management see how this ultimately is bad business practice? Obviously not. Did I really have to endure a wife berating her husband at the next table, with every detail of their dysfunctional family life? Besides which, the pizza was decidedly mediocre. Perhaps a 'one-off' occasion, uncharacteristic of this eatery? Perhaps. Should I go again ... just to make sure it's not really all that bad? Yes, I would have, if only the prices weren't so high.
reviews.title: Less than Meets the Eye

Mi fam√≠lia y yo estuvimos en dos ocasiones en Bar-Pizzeria-Trattoria AI BARI a finales de enero de 2019. 
El lugar es de aspecto sencillo y l√≠mpio. La carta ofrece una muy variada lista de pastas y pizzas. El servicio es eficiente y r√°pido. Todo lo preparan al momento siendo la calidad y la cantidad de los platos muy buena.

reviews.text: Well, phone flat so intended to go somewhere else nearby recommended in the guide book. Closed when we got there so came across this place and went in. A bit tatty but clean would sum the place up. We had 2 pasta dishes and 1/2l wine each. Both pasta dishes were lovely and the total came to ‚Ç¨31. The pizzas looked fantastic and I noticed that the owner makes his own dough which is a plus as well. No photos as phone flat. Would definitely go back.

reviews.text: Low orices, food was ok. High variety of pizzas to choose from, also some dishes of the day to choose from. No frills restaurant- can go for a quick lunch/dinner. Pizzas from 6 to 10 euros, glass of wine 3.5 euro.

reviews.text: We ate a couple of fairly average pizzas. They were freshly made, but the taste was only ok. The service was fine. The price was reasonable (around ‚Ç¨11 per pizza once you factor in the mandatory cover charge or ‚Äòcoperto‚Äô).
reviews.title: Ok pizza

reviews.text:
Following a long first day in Venice we were worn out and ready for something to eat near our hotel. I was hoping for somewhere autentic and cheap with a glass of red but it has to please my fussy teenager too. We has passed this place earlier and it looked busy and with a good atmosphere.  

I ordered thw homemade taglitelle vongole with cozze i think it said. I knew vongole was clams but wasn't sure what else i was getting! The dish arrived with mussels and vongole in a delicious buttery, garlicky sauce with parsley and parmesan and was absolutely delicious. My daughter had a big pile of spaghetti with tomato sauce and ate the lot. Bread and a great red wine finished the meal and the bill came in at 28 euro, well worth it!

The owner served us and im guessing it was his wife cooking. Everything came quickly and efficiently.

I nearly marked the place down for its decor, it is very basic formica, but its clean and the food was so tasty they deserve a 5 in my book.
reviews.title: Homemade pasta

reviews.text:
Lovely food and service. Definitely recommend a meal here while you are in venice. 
Wine (always the most important), pizzas, pastas and desserts were really good. 
We walked past it a few times before trying as from outside it looks more like a cafe then a restaurant. However it's well worth the visit and we are disappointed we didn't go there before our last night as we would have definitely been back. 
I've already recommended here to others and if we have the delight of returning to venice we will definitely come here again. A lovely Italian experience.
reviews.title: Brilliant

reviews.text: Muy bueno!!! Sthepano es un personaje,  tipico Veneciano, prepara los mejores Aperol Spritz!!! No es un restaurante bar turistico, preparan la comida y pasta al momento, como g√±oquis y pizza, los precios son razonables, teniendo en cuenta que es Venecia, ponen muy buena musica (rock clasico)
reviews.title: Cena y drinks

reviews.text: Buscaba probar unos buenos carbonara, arrabiata, calzone, ....y sin pagar excesos. Ya vereis que lso precios estan muya justados y la calidad est√° de primera. No busqueis lujos en el local, no los hay. Un buen trato, una comida excelente y buen precio!!!
reviews.title: Si buscas una trattoria sin lujos y con una calidad precio muy buena este es Ai Bari

reviews.text:
We popped in here late one evening for an evening snack (having had a big lunch). My wife and I shared a pizza margherita and this was a good amount of food to see us through the night - we could easily have eaten one each as a full meal though!

The pizza was quick to arrive and tasted good - it was thin, probably more tomato than cheese, and very reasonably priced.
reviews.title: Nice for a good value pizza

reviews.text: Stumbled out of hotel and smelt this place. Locals and tourists alike enjoying great pizza and pasta. House red wine great.  Cheap and good

reviews.text:

Le cadre n'est pas merveilleux mais la pizza et vraiment tres bonne

reviews.title: Tres bonne pizza

reviews.text:
First and very Important: Haven't try their food, but it was super crowded and smell was super good.
So, the reason i leave this review, will be i wish these small things change and may this Pizzeria have better reviews:
It was late night, and we got lost, no free wifi. I tried to ask if they knew the location of our hotel (witch was next door and they knew it when i told the address) When servers realized we're not gonna eat there, they decide to not waste time on us. 
Btw we left our luggage and went eating, but unfortunately, not at Ai bari. sorry.
reviews.title: Open till late, was crouded, food was smelling good. not too friendly staff.

reviews.text: E' una fortuna che esistano posti cos√¨. In primo luogo i prezzi non sono alti e non mi aspettavo di trovare una trattoria "normale" da questo punto di vista a Venezia. Il locale √® molto rustico come la cucina. I piatti sono semplici, con ingredienti di tutti i giorni. Abbiamo preso gnocchetti burro e salvia e gnocchetti al rag√π d'anatra, entrambi squisiti. Insomma, se volete andare sul sicuro recatevi in questa trattoria.

name: Irish Pub Santa Lucia
address: Cannaregio 282/b, 30100 Venice Italy

reviews.text:
Having read reviews we ventured out on first night in Venice back in December to visit the Irish Pub Santa Lucia.

Drinks are expensive and 7 euros for a vodka lemonade is a bit steep  but Venice is expensive itself.

I was more disappointed at how small the pub is and how easy it is for the pub to become overcrowded.

Staff were welcoming however and there are positives of my visit.
reviews.title: Disappointing but better than other bars

reviews.text: Brilliant stop with the family. Nicolo was great chat, great service and company. Felt very at home and had many a drink ahead of schedule. Rate 100%. The Leeds lot x
reviews.title: Awesome visit, great staff.

reviews.text:
Un po' all'interno rispetto alla via di maggior passaggio, questo locale abbina alle birre irlandesi un po' di panini e tramezzini veneziani.
Oltre ad un buon spritz abbiamo gustato due ottimi toast con un pane leggermente scuro molto friabile.
I prezzi sono assolutamente onesti e il servizio √® ottimo.
Se volete fare una pausa snack o pranzare rapidamente in modo leggero, lo consiglio!

reviews.text: Pub chico, encantador,  m√∫sica de los 60/70/80, un lujo. Sandwiches exquisitos y lo mejor de todo GUINNESS, muy recomendable.

reviews.text: We came here to watch the rugby match - it's not a very big bar so it was cramped but it kind of added to the atmosphere and we got chatting to the people we were standing with. A great selection of beers and other drinks and, while we didn't eat, the food looked nice.

reviews.text:
Went to this pub to have a beer and eat something while watching the game. I entered the place and asked the waiter what game they were going to show but he didn‚Äôt answer my question. He said that the bar was full, although there was a free small table, and when I tried to mention the free table he interrupted and repeated that the bar was full. Then I tried to ask if later they would‚Äôve space, but he once again interrupted me: the bar is full!.
All those interruptions were already disrespectful, but the attitude he had was the worse. Something like ‚Äújust get out of here, this place isn‚Äôt for you‚Äù, hard to put into words.
Very bad experience, will never return.
reviews.title: Terrible service

reviews.text: It's as irish as the man on Mars, the one barman is off the wall. Ignorant unfriendly and like a walking machine. People are on holidays and don't need that kind of thing

reviews.text:
What did we find in the heart of Venice?!?  A real Irish Pub with not only great international beers from Europe and the U.S., but six bottles from a micro in Venice!!  Fantastic beer, a great looking place, great service and an amazing location.   
Have your wine in Tuscany, drink beer on Venice here!!!

reviews.text:
I thought it was weird that there was an Irish pub in Venice, but it was recommended by our host. And man oh man are we glad we stopped here! From the delicious beer and wine options they had that we hadn't tried before. 

We liked this place so bad we went back for breakfast...TWICE! It was amazing. Highly highly recommended from food, atmosphere, and service. If we go back to Venice, we will be back here for sure!

reviews.text: Pleasant little bar, good beer and sandwiches! Not too busy when we were there, a little off the beaten track.

reviews.text:
We love Irish pubs and planned to visit one in each city while in Italy. Typical place, cozy and nice outdoor seating area too. Drinks priced typical for Venice as you are in a tourist area.
Friendly service and nice atmosphere. Tried to go back on our second day to sit outside but it was full which isn't a bad thing and just shows that people enjoy the place. Worth stopping if in the area. Cheers!

reviews.text: We ended up in here a few times during our trip. The cocktails are lovely and the choice of beers is really good too.

reviews.text:
Das Personal ist sehr unh√∂flich. Hat man sich hingesetzt und etwas ausgesucht, musste man sehr lange warten um etwas zu bestellen. 
Der Kellner hat uns 3 Mal angemacht, ob wir uns mit dem Bestellen nicht beeilen k√∂nnten, da er noch andere G√§ste habe.

name: Hostaria Osottoosopra

reviews.text: Ho pranzato con la mia ragazza in questa Osteria spinto dalle numerose recensioni positive; avevamo aspettative molto alte che sono state soddisfatte ampiamente. L‚Äôantipasto di sarde in soar, polenta e crostini di baccal√† era SUBLIME, molto buoni anche i primi. Degno di nota positiva anche il ragazzo che ci ha serviti, estremamente educato e professionale e molto preparato sui vini. Ci ritorneremo sicuramente appena sar√† possibile.

I piatti ottimi e sostanziosi (consiglio i ravioli ricotta e spinaci con mascarpone tartufato), il locale ben arredato e il prezzo buono. reviews.text: I'm glad we found this gem of Venezia. My son had scrumptious beef cheek that you could die for and I had crawfish homemade pasta as primo and liver & oatmeal mash as secondo, which I thoroughly enjoyed.  Beef cheek was so tender and went well with creamy mash and I never had such a tasty liver before in my life. We were served by two different waiters who both were very friendly and attentive and made us feel very comfortable. We would definitely love to come back to try more meals there... thank you so much for lovely meals!
reviews.title: Lovely meal & friendly staff

Senza dubbio tra location e cibo uno dei migliori ristoranti provati negli ultimi anni a Venezia. Servizio eccellente e super rapido,camerieri organizzatissimi e discreti. veramente eccezionale!!!

reviews.title: A very good quality hotel restauarant

reviews.text: Fantastic services from the staff. From the beginning to the end you're welcome. The food is very "groovy". Italian cusine with a lot of Eastern touches and local products. Perfect wine pairing with food.
reviews.title: Executive dinner for 2

reviews.text: Wow!!!  Every single moment was amazing!! Starting with the subtly gorgeous table arrangements to create a more private experience.  The staff is so attentive and well trained.  They did not miss a beat offering a most exquisite dining experience!!  Thank you to all for making a gorgeous vacation memory!!
reviews.title: Superb in Every Way!!

reviews.text: Ristorante di alto livello. Accogliente e ben arredato, all'interno dell'hotel metropole. Cucina ricercata con indovinati richiami al territorio.  Carta dei vini notevole.  Servizio attento senza esagerazioni nella formalita' .  Prezzi elevati ma giustificati dalla qualita' della proposta complessiva
reviews.title: BELLA ESPERIENZA

reviews.text:
This was our first Michelin experience in Italy.

The service was excellent. Our waiter was well informed, spoke food English and presented the food with a high level of theatre.

We both had the Vegetarian tasting menu overall which was top notch. 

The bread bag (not a basket) was imaginative and very light.

We preferred some courses more than others but all were well presented.  Good to see that the vegetarian options are thought through not an add on.

Risotto was amazing. Beetroot linguine was delicious. The meringue was lovely.

Decor not to everyone‚Äôs taste but part of the charm of the metropole hotel.
reviews.title: Superb vegetarian menu with top class service

reviews.text: D√®s que l‚Äôon p√©n√®tre dans le lobby on est surpris par l‚Äôambiance et l‚Äôorignalit√© des lieux, les couleurs sont chaudes et tout est raffin√©. Au bar ou au restaurant, on est pris par chaque d√©tail de la d√©coration, c‚Äôest orignal, magnifique, unique. Si on ne sait  pas que le restaurant est √©toil√©, d√®s que les amuses bouches sont servis on sait que le repas sera excellent et en effet, tout est d√©licieux. Le personnel est aux petits soins, √©l√©gants,  discrets mais attentifs. Quelle belle soir√©e !
reviews.title: Le mariage du beau et du bon !

reviews.text: Met Restaurant is in Hotel Metropole in a few connected rooms with very nice art on the walls. We had a 6 course dinner, which took 4+ hours, which was lengthier than we were expecting. The food was very good and was presented very nicely, but a bit more pricey than you can get for same quality food.
reviews.title: Very good, but lengthy and pricey

reviews.text: Comme dans chaque voyage nous essayons de d√©couvrir la cuisine local vu par un grand chef. Cette fois, ce sera le Term et la cuisine de Luca Veriti. La salle est surprenante, tr√®s charg√©e avec des tentures... le personnel super intentionn√©,  mais ne parlent que tr√®s peu le fran√ßais et ne font aucun effort au moment de la pr√©sentation des plats... le serveur t'explique sans se soucier une seconde si tu comprends ce qu'il dit... dommage ! Les assiettes: super int√©ressantes. Elles sont belles, bonnes, go√ªteuse et √©quilibr√©es.  Les produits de la r√©gion sont √†  l'honneur.  Mais par contre peu de surprise ou de ouha en dehors du dessert , bluffant.  Moi qui n'aime pas le chocolat blanc et truffe blanche... l√† j'avais les deux et c'√©tait excellent !.. Mais reste un tr√®s bon moment !
reviews.title: Bon restaurant

reviews.text:
Siamo stati a pranzo, mia moglie ed io, con un paio di amici.
Abbiamo speso 250‚Ç¨ a testa e devo dire che.. non sono state ben spese.
Ambiente magnifico, come solo un palazzo veneziano pu√≤ essere.
Servizio da 10 e lode, personale attento, gentile ma mai invadente od eccessivo.
La cosa che ci ha lasciato perplessi, o quantomeno non completamente soddisfatti √® proprio il cibo.
Abbiamo preso il menu degustazione e devo dire che su 6 piatti, due sono ampiamente dimenticabili ( il pat√® niente di particolare, la ricciola era ok ma niente  di pi√π ) e forse solo il risotto ci ha colpito, di tutte le proposte.
Un po' pochino per quanto abbiamo pagato.
reviews.title: Alti e bassi

reviews.text: La cuisine est raffin√©e, nous avons pris le menu d√©gustation. Tous les plats ne sont pas r√©ussis et certains peuvent d√©cevoir un peu. Mais globalement une belle exp√©rience , un tr√®s joli d√©cor et un service impeccable.
reviews.title: Raffin√©

name: Cip's Club
address: Isola della Giudecca 10 Giudecca 10, 30133 Venice Italy

reviews.text: Pour boire un verre ou manger, de jour comme de nuit, la beaut√© du lieu et de la vue √©gale la qualit√© des produits propos√©s.
reviews.title: Ultimate

reviews.text: La terrazza esterna ha una vista meravigliosa sulla sponda opposta dove si trova Piazza San Marco. Servizio buono, cucina ottima, prezzi elevati ma in linea con il livello dell'hotel. Dispone di shuttle boat gratuita per raggiungere Piazza San Marco.
reviews.title: Pranzo con vista

reviews.text:
The best view , food and service in Venice .
The special meal begins with the complimentary water taxi and being met on arrival then accompanied to the restaurant . The menu is Venetian food with a modernised twist and everything our party of 6 ordered was delicious . 
The evening was a lovely experience and I would recommend anyone travelling to Venice to eat here .
reviews.title: The best view , food and service

reviews.text: This is a bit of a mixed review as we are looking at the whole lunch experience including the hotel, hence the three stars.  We visited for a Sunday lunch and were one of only three couples in the restaurant as Venice is so quiet.  The food was excellent and the service was fine in the restaurant.  However, there are a few negatives.  Unless you are staying in the hotel, you will arrive in the hotel Cipriani boat from San Marco square, but there are no signs for the Cip club and even when directed, it is still not easy to find.  As we were not hotel guests, we were not not made to feel particularly welcome and were ignored when we tried to get a pre lunch drink at the pool bar (we gave up after 15 mins).  The cost is also excessive for what is effectively a terrace on the water.  Overall, it is good, but the hotel should make more of an effort to welcome other guests who may be staying in other exclusive hotels and considering staying at the hotel Cipriani (which we were, and which we will not).
reviews.title: Romantic lunch in Venice

reviews.text:
Si arriva al Belmond Cipriani Cip's con il servizio di barca privata offerta dal hotel che parte comodamente dal molo di p.zza San Marco. Si cena su una terrazza/palafitta che guarda sul bacino di San Marco e offre un panorama mozzafiato e indimenticabile di Venezia. Tavolo apparecchiato con stile, con bicchieri di Murano e servizio cortese e attento.
Per tutto questo meriterebbe un voto pari a 5 ma la cucina non √® all'altezza delle aspettative e del rapporto qualit√†/prezzo. Ottime materie prime ma piatti troppo semplici e impiattamenti banali che non corrispondono alla categoria del locale.
Discutibili i dessert, solo uno ottimo su tre provati. Si pu√≤ fare molto meglio. Rimane comunque una location consigliata.
reviews.title: Bella serata ma...

reviews.text:
We arrived at 7.10pm, 20min before opening. The staff advised us to take a walk and come back later. 

When we came back we were professionally welcomed and got a table outside with a nice view. Menu showed a good and interesting variety of dishes, however, the prices promised a much higher quality than we actually got (e.g. a relatively simple Tomato Soup with some mint for 40 Euro). Then we had the calf liver, which was presented in an unloving way and well, a seabass, which was ok. 

When we wanted to pay the bill was presented with a failure and then we had to wait another 10min before processing. 

Overall it was a more or less average experience which came with a two Michelin Star price. At the end of the day unfortunately we can not recommend this restaurant.
reviews.title: Overprized with very average food and service

reviews.text: Da fehlt noch was... aber denke es hat mit dem lockdown zutun. Service ist definitiv nicht top. Man musste froh sein bedient zu werden. Essen war gut. Lage nat√ºrlich top. Aber eben ich denke nach dem lockdown ist das Team noch etwas eingerostet. Hingegen und testen
reviews.title: Da fehlt noch was... aber

reviews.text:
We went there because the restaurant where we wanted to go was already full, dare I say it was an amazing 2 choice, even better than the first one! 

The food is really good in quality and how it is cooked. The plates are traditional dishes that you usually find in Italian restaurants, but this ones are on a different scale. All there pasta‚Äôs are really good quality and the toppings as well. They also have really refreshing salads. The meat and the fish are both top notch quality but especially the fish. The wine is also really tasty. There desert are unreal. Their menu is really well balanced. 

The service is adequat to the place, meaning it is amazing. The people there treat you like real Italians would, even though it‚Äôs your first time they behave as if you were a daily costumer. We were with my family and they were so attentionate to my little cousins. Their friendliness really made us promise to come back!

The scenary and location of the place is stunning. We went for dinner so we caught the sunset. The sky was orange and pink, the rays of the sun reflects on our knives, forks and glass. Everything had a warm orange hue. The place is very romantic, just on the canal of Venezia the water reflects the moon and sunset . 

This place is a must if you ever go to Venezia and can afford it. Bring family, friends or even business to this dream like place!
reviews.title: Unforgettable experience !

reviews.text: We booked lunch at Cips Club to celebrate my 60th birthday, and they didn‚Äôt disappoint. The greeting was warm and friendly, and the service throughout the meal was excellent. The food we had was of the finest quality and undoubtedly the best that we had in Venice. Nothing was too much trouble: happy with us each having a half bottle of wine (one red one white) from their incredible wine list. And a surprise treat of a ‚Äúbirthday‚Äù tiramisu. The views were great, the food magnificent...of such things are great memories made, and isn‚Äôt that the point of travelling?
reviews.title: Birthday lunch

reviews.text: The Food & Service was Remarkable. The portions were plentiful. The food was fresh and so so good. My father's family are from Venice I know this food but the freshness of there food was Fabulous. It is a Must to try the Cip. I was at the Belmond 4 days and ate at the Cip 3 times that's how GOOD it was.
reviews.title: Daughter & Mother Wonderful Journey

reviews.text: Wow!!! This restaurant was so impressive. We felt so extravagant (which is not our style at all.) Took my wife here for a romantic dinner during our trip to Venice. Very expensive, but we knew it would be going in, so it was not an issue at all. If you want to experience Venice at it‚Äôs absolute finest, give Cip‚Äôs Club a try. Just make sure you understand the prices and service speed going in.
reviews.title: Romantic dinner in Venice.

reviews.text: Located on an small island off the coast of Venice, the view from the restaurant back towards downtown Venice is breathtaking. The service was impeccable. The food was exquisite. Fine dining at its best. My wife and I couldn't have been more impressed than that of our experience at Cip's.
reviews.title: Lovely; Memorable; Pricey

reviews.text:
Incredible Venetian food.  Wonderful appetizers, entrees.  Great bread and wine.
We did not have dessert but they give you light and delicious cookies after dinner.  The atmosphere is intimate and the view is the lagoon since the restaurant actually sits on the water.  The service is excellent.  It is pricey but worth it.  It is frequented by locals not only those staying at the hotel.  Many tourists staying at other hotels go to eat at Cip's Club.  It is highly recommended.
reviews.title: Cip's Club Belmond Hotel Cipriani

reviews.text: Lunch at Cip's Club at the Hotel Cipriani is a must for the sophisticated traveler.  The food matches the spectacular view from the Giudecca which is just a 10 minute boat ride on the Cipriani boat across the canal basin.   The service is impeccable, as it should be;  the wines superior; and the food delicious.   Attire is dressy, even at lunch. But don't be surprised by the prices.  Oh, by the way, try the bread sticks and the brown bread which are some of the best in Venice.
reviews.title: Lunch with an Amazing View, Good Food and Prices to Match

reviews.text:
We visited because I was looking for somewhere special for my partner's 30th birthday and we weren't disappointed.

The restaurant is on Giudecca and it is absolutely worth getting the free hotel boat from San Marco - riding across the lagoon at night was an amazing experience. It drops you off in the hotel grounds and the walk to the restaurant is lovely.

The restaurant is in a perfect location on a waterfront terrace looking out towards the city. Fantastic as a romantic spot. It is heated and I was able to wear a shirt in October without feeling cold. Note that at this time of year they put up a transparent plastic screen to keep out the windchill - this obscures the view a bit but it's still stunning.

The food was great. My partner is a vegetarian and they have a dedicated vegetarian menu with lots of options. I had the tuna carpaccio and the beef fillet and they were both cooked perfectly - I was thinking about the food for the rest of the trip!

Staff were very friendly and were clearly keen to ensure we felt they weren't hovering over us but this did mean that we struggled to get their attention to order more drinks. At the end of the day, this didn't massively detract from the experience.
reviews.title: Perfect for a special occasion

reviews.text: Ein wahrer H√∂hepunkt einer Venedigreise: Der beste Blick auf die Serenissima, hervorragendes Essen und bester Service. Tout comme il faut !
reviews.title: Ein Traum

reviews.text: Quite simply, I ordered the most delicious risotto and my husband ordered a gorgeous dish of sole and Venetian vegetables.  The sole was declared to be the dish of the vacation and I can confidently report that the morel risotto was the most perfect example of risotto tasted to date.  The sommelier offered perfect advice and all wait servers were professionally warm and helpful.
reviews.title: Delicious

reviews.text:
Nous avions une r√©servation pour 14:00 et sommes arriv√©s avec 10mn de retard.
Nous avons bien failli ne pas pouvoir manger car la cuisine fermait...
Nous avons donc tr√®s vite command√©.
Les plats de p√¢tes ont √©t√© tr√®s appr√©ci√©s, mon conjoint et moi avons command√© le poisson du jour.
C'√©tait un filet de sea bass, frit √† la po√™le, servi avec quelques pommes de terre saut√©es insipides et (√† mon go√ªt) pas assez cuites: cela ne vaut pas les 42‚Ç¨.
La tarte au citron du dessert servie dans une assiette creuse(tr√®s malcommode) avec une sauce anglaise autour n'avait absolument pas go√ªt de citron.
Par contre la cro√ªte √©tait d√©licieuse.
Allez y pour le cadre....
reviews.title: D√©cus par la cuisine

reviews.text: Views, service, wine, food, dessert and limoncello. Enjoyed our lagoon side table with impeccable service and delicious food
reviews.title: Superb

reviews.text:
It was on our list, had to go. 
Free water taxi from a dedicated dock in front of San Marco Piazza was a winning touch. Our day found us with rains, so we sat inside...great service and nice food. Frankly nothing out of this world special. 

The artichoke bottom w mozzarella, pesto and mint was the winner. 
His cannoloni was good, more meat than typically found in this dish in our history.
Grilled veggies - healthy side were nice.

The house tagliolini with cream sauce, ham and cheese was ok. Perhaps just my taste buds on the day. 
Nice wine list. 
Spendy- which was expected-
Cannot control Mother Nature‚Äîbut try to go in fair weather and sit outside.
reviews.title: Lovely venue great service

reviews.text:
The view from Cips is breathtaking.

Looking to San Marco from Giudecca is a wonder.

So is the food any good.

YES.

Had planned to eat at Oro,  after the Cips experience, ate Cips again.
reviews.title: Outstanding Vista with food to match

reviews.text:
Cip‚Äôs is so extraordinarily lovely we returned for a second dinner next day. We have always loved this m restaurant and as it has matured it has become better than ever. Dining by the rail watching the water traffic and enjoying one of the most wonderful views in the world with such fabulous food and friendly, welcoming service is unbeatable in this city.

Cip‚Äôs restaurant, wonderfully managed by Mr Bianca, is now in its‚Äô 21st year. On chilly nights it remains warm and cosy and beautifully lit...a fine dining and yet relaxed restaurant for every occasion.

Marianna, Cip‚Äôs expert sommelier, is particularly knowledgeable and passionate but all of the staff are so good.

Booking is usually essential. Every time we visit we see walk-ups being politely turned away.
reviews.title: Venetian perfection

reviews.text:
Cip‚Äôs is an incredible restaurant although certainly not cheap!

The restaurant is part of the stunning Belmond Cipriani Hotel and offers an incredible view of the city from the opposite bank to St Mark‚Äôs. A free water taxi return is included as part of the visit to the restaurant.

The food is exceptional - we ordered a seafood medley to start, also served with a generous serving of bread and olive oil - followed by spaghetti and breaded veal cutlet with cherry tomatoes. All of the food was superb and the service exceptional, as was the wine.

Four complimentary miniature desserts completed a great meal which, with a half bottle of red wine and two bottles of still water, came in at just over 200 euros. Expensive, but worth it...
reviews.title: Stunning venue and great food

reviews.text: Great view and amazing food. Loved the boat ride from San Marcos square. Staff was very nice and the atmosphere even better.
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.text:
I had planned the outing to Cip's as a final night celebration in Venice. The concierge at our hotel, the Baglioni, made the reservation and assisted with getting to the water taxi so it started out well. The view of the city is spectacular from the restaurant and seemed to be a perfect place to end the first part of a visit to Europe. 

However it was not. We seemed to be invisible to the staff and waited for at least 25 minutes for anyone to take our drink order prior to dinner. Wine arrived and they wanted to take our dinner order immediately. The meal started out well-the appetizer with pumpkin flowers was simply delicious. However our main courses were incredibly disappointing, lacking in flavour. Absolutely no one came to check on our meals or to offer more wine. Took forever for our bill to arrive and then longer for us to pay. We returned to our hotel for a nightcap, perfectly served with friendly attention-quite a difference from Cip's.
reviews.title: So disappointing

reviews.text: Even if one is nit staying at the Cipriani Hotel on the Giudecca it is worth a boat ride over for dinner. The view of the San Marco basin and Square with all the fairy tale buildings surrounding them makes for a beautiful backdrop for excellent food and service.
reviews.title: Enchanting Location

reviews.text: Super endroit sans fausse note du d√©but √† la fin avec une cuisine go√ªteuse dans un cadre unique. A bient√¥t
reviews.title: Quel cadre

reviews.text: Thank you for the experience, always impeccable food and service, great Amarone from the sommelier, and the view!
reviews.title: Cip‚Äôs with ‚ÄúTHE‚Äù view

reviews.text: CIPS Venice: ‚Äú Having lived in the 90s in NYC I enjoyed Cipriani uptown first and then downtown and then the rest of them all around the  city. Recently on my trip to Venice hotel concierge recommended a new Cipriani creation CIPS right on the dock directly opposite San Marco so when dining you get to see magical Venice and a nicely lit outdoor restaurant terrace of Daniele hotel where food is actually better then in CIPS...Wher do I start! At first you need to spend 60euros each way on a lovely canal taxi. Menu - lacks creativity , it‚Äôs just a list of things that they decided not to repeat in their main restaurant ORO. Watered down tomato soup, cheapest choice of salmon from Russia ( Kamchatka bla bla bla) for 50euro for an appetizer with few black caviar eggs to justify the price. Famous Cipriani beef carpaccio here was presliced at least day before already oxidized and started to look very unappetizing and my favorite dressing( which I can‚Äôt still replicate at home) this time looked and tasted like store bought mayonnaise. Some Italian chefs achieve a very fine result by not adding butter at all in their risotto dishes but in CIPS porcini mushrooms were drowning in the Venice‚Äôs butter lagoon desperately trying to stay afloat by grabbing to the grains of rice ... for another 50 euros or so. What saved the dinner ( besides our lovely conversation) is a global Cipriani staple and my personal favorite dessert- meringue cake! To summarize the experience: One of most romantic setting in the world, money to burn and an opportunity not to gain weight after dinner in Italy!
reviews.title: I am very surprised((((

reviews.text: Siamo tornati e abbiamo ritrovato la stessa qualit√† della volta scorsa. Vista meravigliosa,  personale preparato,  cibo ottimo. Consigliatissimo per chi vuole qualit√† unita alla tradizione. Location unica.
reviews.title: Ritorno meraviglioso

reviews.text:
We enjoyed the trip across to the Cipriano as we had done on a previous visit. Te staff were very welcoming on our arrival and showed us the way to Cip's Club for our previously booked lunch. 
we enjoyed the walk through the beautiful grounds to our table with views to St Mark's Square.
The food was beautifully served and cooked.
We walked rounds to the swimming Pool after our meal but since we weren't residents couldn't have the luxury of a swim there.
reviews.title: Anniversary meal at the Cipriano

reviews.text: Excellent service from the moment we were picked up by boat at St Marks and taken over to the Cipriani hotel. The restaurant was on the edge of the complex with views over to Venice. Plenty sea food on the menu which was delicious. It was expensive but worth it for a special meal.
reviews.title: Anniversary Meal

reviews.text:
A very special location with magnificent views of San Marco. We enjoyed an outdoor waterside table with a view of the Venice night skyline. Our meal and drinks were truly delicious to match. Everything we had was just perfect.
 We appreciated the complimentary boat launch which transports you from San Marco Piazza to the Belmond property in Giudecca, about 10-15 minute ride.
I wish we had known to bring Mosquito repellent as we were bitten up while dining at dusk. And the evening we were there it was almost 100 degrees F. We were melting. They do have some cooling fans, but it didn't do enough to cool us off, certainly not their fault, it was just the heat wave in late June! We would recommend and return when in Venice again!
reviews.title: Fabulous and special meal at a gorgeous location in Giudecca with views of San Marco

reviews.text: Consigliatoci da un‚Äôamica, decidiamo di prenotare. All‚Äôatto della prenotazione, constatiamo immediatamente la cordialit√† e la disponibilit√† del personale, stesso trattamento anche durante la cena, quando ci pareva che ogni nostro desiderio potesse essere esaudito. Pietanze eccellenti e vista sulla laguna mozzafiato. Da provare.
reviews.title: Semplicemente fantastico

reviews.text:
Un d√Æner parfait, en amoureux, sur un des plus beaux pontons de Venise, au calme de la Giudecca...
Personnel tr√®s attentionn√©, service impeccable (normal dans un endroit de ce standing, mais √ßa m√©rite d'√™tre dit).
Carte des vins assez d√©mentielle, avec bien sur, de quoi se faire mal niveau prix (voire tr√®s tr√®s mal...), mais gr√¢ce aux conseils d'une sommeli√®re aussi efficace que sympathique, nous avons pu trouver notre bonheur avec un tr√®s bon vin italien, aux alentours de 150‚Ç¨ la bouteille.
Les plats √©taient succulents, simples (car la cuisine italienne n'est bonne que quand elle est simple), mais parfaitement con√ßus et ex√©cut√©s.
Bref, soir√©e d'un excellent niveau, rien √† redire. A faire et √† refaire.
reviews.title: La perfection a un prix, certes, mais c'est la perfection...

reviews.text:
La vue exceptionnelle qu‚Äôa ce restaurant sur Venise, en particulier le soir au coucher de soleil, fait que nous consid√©rons d‚Äôy d√Æner √† chaque passage  √† Venise comme un must indispensable.
Par rapport √† notre pr√©c√©dent passage, la cuisine certes tr√®s classique, la carte restant √† peu pr√®s la m√™me d‚Äôann√©e, √©tait bonne et m√™me en progr√®s. L‚Äôaddition est cependant en comparaison tr√®s ch√®re. On aimerait donc un l√©ger plus voire un peu de cr√©ativit√© ou d‚Äôorgina sur certains plats.
L‚Äôendroit reste magique et √† pr√©server avec un dress code un peu plus strict, en demandant par exemple  de ne pas venir d√Æner en bermuda.
reviews.title: La plus belle vue sur Venise

reviews.text: Waterside table with a view of the Venice night skyline was amazing, as was the food. Portions were perfect, we did not feel overwhelmed by the food. Excellent wine list, very helpful sommelier. Mosquito repellant important for dining around time of sunset.
reviews.title: Beautiful view, excellent food

reviews.text: The staff at Cip‚Äôs Club couldn‚Äôt have been more helpful and welcoming. In particular they did a brilliant job dealing with a difficult food allergy, treating it as easy to accommodate. The service was really excellent, as was the food. Highly recommend the green spaghetti and ham which was far better than it sounds. The sunset view was unparalleled and the boat trip across the canal was an added bonus too. Definitely an occasion meal for us but easily worth it.
reviews.title: Excellent dinner, perfect service and amazing view

reviews.text: This could be your splurge restaurant in Venice for the view, the food and the service.  It is situated at the Cipriani hotel and most tables on a pier over the water.  The outdoor location has heaters and the views are spectacular.  All this does some at a price . . .
reviews.title: A beautiful view of Venice from Giudecca, wonderful food and service . . . for a price

reviews.text: We were lucky to get the perfect night - still over 20 degrees at 8.30pm when we arrived - and for sure Cip‚Äôs Club must have the best views of any restaurant in Venice, looking back over San Marco from Giudecca.  We had impeccable service, very friendly and professional, the food was faultless and the Sommelier was really brilliant, anticipating everything that we needed.  It‚Äôs not cheap being part of the Belmont Cipriani, but absolutely worth it from our perspective.  We would have gone back the following night if we didn‚Äôt already have a reservation somewhere else.  We loved it!!
reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it

reviews.text: We were really thrilled to be taking the private launch over from St Marks for a lovely lunch on the deck over the water, with view of Venice at its best.  Unfortunately, we were out of luck.  We got fairly wet walking through the gardens in a torrent of rain, sat inside with no view to speak of (except other guests) and had a pleasant luncheon.  Bit disappointed really.  Food fine, wine fine.  Expensive.
reviews.title: Horrible wet day - had to eat inside, so this probably did not help

reviews.text:
we surprised the girls as we arrived at the Cipriano launch jetty, sadly decent shoes in plastic bags as the weather was not so pleasant. Arrived safely and headed directly to the bar after a shoe change! the girls had Bellini cocktails and the boys the usual dry martini cocktail, so good we ordered a further round, hang the expense.
The Cip restaurant did not disappoint I shared a whole poached Turbot I won't go on about the other choices except to say all was excellent and what a cheerful team of waters bar and restaurant lovely evening.
reviews.title: with friends recap old times

reviews.text:
Venezia √® Venezia, si sa, e avere la possibilit√† di pranzare godendosi un panorama unico al mondo davvero non ha prezzo.
Men√π semplice ma di assoluta raffinatezza, con un occhio di riguardo alla tradizione del territorio e alla scelta accurata delle materie prime.
Servizio ineccepibile e gran cura dei dettagli.
Complimenti a tutto lo staff!
reviews.title: Meraviglia

reviews.text: My husband surprised me with lunch at Cip‚Äôs to celebrate our 25th Wedding Anniversary.  After the hustle & bustle of St Marks Square, Cip‚Äôs was a beautiful oasis of calm and we enjoyed a fabulous lunch by the waterside in the beautiful afternoon sun.  We were treated with a complimentary boat ride back across the water afterwards.  Service and good were wonderful.
reviews.title: What a treat!

reviews.text: though we weren't staying at this hotel, we decided to have dinner here and glad we did. the meals were excellent and service were top notch. this is a pricey place, but what would you expect being at a cipriani location...will be back to eat and stay next year
reviews.title: love this restaurant and view

reviews.text: By escaping from the crowds of St Marks the elegant shuttle boat glides you across the lagoon to the peaceful oasis of the Cipriani.  On the waterfront facing the principle sights of Venice, you can not only relax at Cips Club but also indulge in a lavish and imaginative meal.  The service is impeccable and the food is both beautifully presented and also delicious.  It is suitable for either a special occasion or just to spoil yourselves.
reviews.title: One of the best views of Venice

reviews.text: Cips is one of the restaurants at Cipriani, as short boat ride from the Marcus square.  The hotel has its own shuttle that will pick you up.  Very classical Italian, and you will find most of what you expect on the menu.  Great food, good wine selection and a beautiful view from the south bank of the Grand Canal.
reviews.title: Great Traditional in Venice

reviews.text: Can‚Äôt fault this place. The setting. The food. The service. All top notch. Special place. Not cheap but it‚Äôs worth it for something special. Pasta was delicious. Beef was good. Seafood fried scampi and calamari were the best I‚Äôve ever had. So fresh. A perfect night. One to remember and treasure.
reviews.title: Perfect night and setting

reviews.text:
La cucina del Cip‚Äôs spesso passa in secondo piano, il frequentatore medio spesso √® l√¨ per godersi il tragitto in barca per arrivare all‚Äôhotel Cipriani, passeggiare in un bellissimo giardino interno, sbucare da un piccolo portico e vedere Venezia dalla Giudecca. Spiccano la punta della dogana e palazzo ducale, con il campanile di piazza San Marco che non manca mai. 
In precedenza siamo sempre stati sulla terrazza, questa volta date le temperature siamo stati all‚Äôinterno, la sala √® molto accogliete. 
Stare seduti ai loro tavoli da l‚Äôidea di essere a casa, al caldo, e mangiare qual piatto che sa quasi di infanzia. Infatti i piatti sono semplici pur rimanendo eleganti. √à uno dei pochi ristoranti di alto livello in cui si mangia in maniera eccelsa piatti tradizionali cucinati con materie prime di altrettanto livello. 
Il tutto √® accompagnato da un personale cordiale senza essere stucchevole. Il metre molto attento e capace. La sommelier ha una conoscenza impeccabile e una capacit√† di spiegare i vini attenta e chiara, personalmente mi ha colpito positivamente la sua passione e precisone con cui ci sei √® posta. I camerieri molto cordiali, attenti e pacati. 
Consiglio vivamente il Cip‚Äôs a tutti gli amanti della cucina sofisticata, giusto per fare un passetto in dietro e vedere da dove √® partito il tutto, perch√© si sa, tornare a casa a magiare ci√≤ che mangiavi da piccolo non ha prezzo.
reviews.title: Semplice ed elegante

reviews.text: What a wonderful restaurant. We arrived by boat as we were staying in Santa Croce. We had drinks in the bar first then walked to the restaurant. The view of St Marks square and the Grand Canal were amazing. The staff were so friendly and knowledgeable. We had a fantastic meal and could not recommend this restaurant enough, thank you.
reviews.title: Venice

reviews.text: Easy tender across from San Marco. Stunning waterside views. Great wine list with a helpful sommelier. Went for light starters (artichoke/white asparagus). Both were in season and fresh. And then the monkfish (cooked perfectly) and the local liver/onion speciality which was rich but delicious. Great and attentive service. Would definitely return.
reviews.title: Great dinner with stunning views

reviews.text:
Sitting inside as it was rainy, the cosy little restaurant offers great views (even through the rain) and high quality food. 
Looking forward to returning at great weather.
reviews.title: Great lunch with a view

reviews.text: What a view! What a place! Go to the Cipriani phone booth on the St Mark's side and dial 9. A beautiful wooden launch will pick you up and whisk you over the lagoon to lunch on the terrace at the Cipriani. The view back to Venice and St Marks is stunning. Nobody does it better. Try their original Cipriani beef carpaccio or the pasta with cheese and ham. Everything is out of this world. The female sommelier is charming and funny. The staff are exceptional. After lunch go into the hotel and have a cafe by the pool and then slowly take the beautiful wooden boat back to town. Really special.
reviews.title: Just glorious

reviews.text: Arrivati al ristorante subito ci si rende conto del quadro che ci circonda, una vista su piazza San Marco notevole. Men√π interessante, piatti ben bilanciati e personale simpatico hanno fatto si di farci trascorrere una splendida pausa pranzo
reviews.title: Splendida vista

name: Barcollo Oscar
address: Sestiere Santa Croce 191/C, 30135 Venice Italy

reviews.text: Il bar √® gestito da cinesi e offre vari tipi di colazione, sia continentale che all'americana/inglese con un ottimo rapporto qualit√† prezzo. Io ho preso il primo tipo (cappuccino, cornetto e spremuta d'arancia) e devo dire che era tutto molto buono, compreso il cappuccino sorprendentemente! Il mio ragazzo l'opzione con cappuccino, toasts e spremuta d'arancia, dove i toasts erano davvero generosi. Consigliato!

reviews.text: We stopped here for an evening cocktail and truly enjoyed ourselves! Greeted by a lovely young lady who checked on us throughout our time as well as showing interest in our trip to Venice and giving tips! Tasty cocktails at a really reasonable price, complementary crisps and no service charge!
reviews.title: Lovely cocktails

reviews.text: Caff√® accanto alla IUAV, gestito da ragazzi molto educati e gentili! Caff√® buono e non bruciato : una rarit√†. Venite per una colazione o un aperitivo, non rimarrete delusi!

reviews.text: Piccolo bar vicino a piazzale roma, ottimi prezzi, molto bassi. Personale disponibile e sempre presente. Ottimo per colazione/aperitivo!
reviews.title: Piccolo bar vicino a piazzale

reviews.text:
Please save yourself the trouble and just AVOID this restaurant. We went here because it was right across from our hotel and we were starving. We were so hungry and figured we would eat anything -we were wrong. First, the olive oil that is on the table is not authentic. It is no better than vegetable oil in a spray can (actually is in a spritzer bottle...). The gnocchi was a poor excuse for a microwave dinner. It tastes of plastic. I had two pieces and could not go any further. My poor husband was subdued to the eggplant parmigiana- unbeknownst to him, it was the worst culinary mistake every created on this earth. 

Flat in texture, tasteless, and a downright insult to the Italian cuisine. We ended up paying without eating more than a few bites and going back to our hotel to order room service. 

The Olive Garden (a cheap, tasteless US chain restaurant) is more a culinary work of Art compared to this place.
reviews.title: The Olive Garden in US is better.

reviews.text: While getting lost in venice during Aqua Alta, we ran into barcollo, and wow. The service was great, and the food was better. Very happy with this choice
reviews.title: Pleasant surprise

reviews.text: We were waiting to get into our hotel which wasn't ready until 3pm, and we were tired from our long flight from Ontario, Canada. We wanted coffee and hot chocolate. We came across bArCollo and this is where we sat. The service was great, the cappuccino well took some getting used to as did my husbands hot chocolate. We left there and wandered around, then it was beer time..again we ended up here. Had beers and bruschetta bread which was very very tasty. I would definitely recommend going here, the staff are friendly. We went to go back a day later and all was closed up. The table were gone and chairs piled up against the building. I hope they have not closed was a great little place.
reviews.title: Our First Stop

reviews.text: This restaurant was just around the corner from our hotel so it was very convenient for breakfast every morning.  Our server was very helpful.  My daughter had the fruit plate every day, my son liked the ham and cheese sandwich with the hot chocolate and I enjoyed the muffin.  It is a little pricey but everything in Venice is expensive.
reviews.title: Great breakfast

reviews.text: We asked out hotel manager to recommend a place for dinner. We stated we wanted to go where locals would eat and away from most of the tourists. We expected the food would be good but did not expect it to be at the high level it was seeing that the prices were so reasonable. We had several starters, all were exceptional, the melon and prosciutto were especially delicious. One of the best melons I have had in years.The entrees were also very generous in size with flavor to match. We had lasagna, mushroom risotto, mushroom pasta, and a fish dish that was also outstanding. The staff was very attentive and friendly making suggestions when asked. I were seated outside and thoroughly enjoyed watching the coming and going of the neighborhood. Great find and highly recommended. To give you an idea of price, we were a party of nine and our meal, including an alcoholic drink each was 149 euro..now that is reasonable.
reviews.title: A pleasant surprise

reviews.text: Found this restaurant slightly off the beaten track, which looked nice, so decided to eat there. Although the food was nicely cooked and served, the portions were on the small side which left me still feeling hungry after 3 courses. The location was very nice, and the staff were all attentive.
reviews.title: Small portions

reviews.text:
Petit restaurant hors de la zone touristique et proche de la gare. Nous avons pris une pizza tr√®s bonne et des p√¢tes bolognaises communes. L'ambiance n'√©tait pas folle et les serveurs sont beaucoup trop pr√©sents. Comme la majorit√© des restaurants √† Venise, les serveurs nous interpellent d√®s qu'on tourne la t√™te vers leur √©tablissement. 
N√©anmoins, le prix est abordable sans mauvaise surprise.

reviews.text:
Petit restaurant sympathique, loin de la foule touristique. 
Si vous voulez manger vite et bon arr√™tez vous ici. 
Pas cher, certains produits congel√©s mais pr√©cis√© sur le menu donc pas surpris. 
Si vous cherchez de la qualit√© continuez votre route pour un vrai restaurant italien. 
Personnel sympa et accueillant et restaurant joli.
reviews.title: Bon

reviews.text:
We were not expecting much because of the atmosphere at the restaurant, to say the least it was very empty, however, this could be due to the time of year we went and we ate quite late. The food was delicious, I had the seafood risotto and gnocchi and my partner had pizza and tapas. The best thing about this restaurant was the pricing. Considering Venice is an expensive city, this place was wonderfully priced. ‚Ç¨43  for 2 drinks (soft drinks) , 2 starters and 2 mains. This place also did not charge extortionate service charges, as previous places we had been charged us ‚Ç¨8 for the service for similar dishes yet with worse food. It was just great to finally not be caught out by venice‚Äôs prices, and we tipped the waiters because we wanted to.

I do 100% recommend this place if you want a nice dinner with good food but not for fine dining. The waiters were quick to serve (perhaps as we were the only ones in there) and were very good. The only missing thing was the right ambeance. Hope this helps.
reviews.title: Good for a decent meal that‚Äôs not too pricey!

reviews.text:
Situato in una piazzetta piacevole e ben allestito sia all‚Äôinterno che all‚Äôesterno ci ha attirato, anche per la gentilezza della cameriera. Aperitivo nella norma, ma niente di pi√π, per comodit√† decidiamo di fermarci anche per la cena: baccal√† buono, sarde in saor nulla di che e senza uvette e pinoli.
Spaghetti al nero di seppia scotti e assolutamente insapori,li ho cosparsi di pepe, sale e olio. Il servizio pessimo, non per cattiva volont√†, ma per la disorganizzazione unit√† alla poca comprensione dell‚Äôitaliano, ma anche delle altre lingue vedendo lo scontento negli altri tavoli. Al cambio di portata non arrivano le posate, cos√¨ le prendiamo dal tavolo accanto, chiediamo la carta e ci portano il conto......, si cena con il rumore dichi al bancone risciacqua i piatti,e si sentono le discussioni del cameriere poco garbato con la cameriera che non fa altro che ubbidire agli ordini, ma tra loro non si capiscono in quanto di due nazionalit√† differenti..... insomma  da non tornare anche se il prezzo √® corretto.
reviews.title: Improbabile

reviews.text:
Despu√©s de varios d√≠as en Venecia y tras dar nuestro paseo en G√≥ndola, por cierto se lo sacamos en 60‚Ç¨, le preguntamos un lugar donde tomar copas en Venecia a un precio decente, ya que como tod@s nos damos cuenta al llegar una cerveza cuesta 6‚Ç¨, y aqu√≠ por el mismo precio te tomas un cubata y sales m√°s colocad@.

Nei 4 giorni del nostro soggiorno a Venezia abbiamo apprezzato la cordialit√† e la professionalit√† di Rocky e di tutti i suoi colleghi. Abbiamo gustato ottimi spaghetti alle vongole, tonno fresco alla piastra e come sugo delle tagliatelle insieme a pomodorini e olive. L'entrecote con patatine fritte √® una validissima alternativa ai piatti di pesce. Vi sono anche men√π a prezzo fisso. Il rapporto qualit√† prezzo √® molto concorrenziale rispetto alla zona.

Erstaunlich gute Qualit√§t - und das inmitten des touristischen Epizentrums. Eine echte Empfehlung, auch preislich v√∂llig in Ordnung.

reviews.text:
This is a superb Ristorante Pizzeria just a few minutes from Piazza San Marco and has a great outside seating area. We stopped for a quick lunch re-fuel and Pizza and were astonished at the quality of the meal and service. We stayed for 3 hours until the sun came round and removed the shade and persuaded us to move on.

The Pizzas were superbly light, as was the home made bread, and the Mussels/Clams were a delight. Very good vegetarian options as well and with quality wine it was just a gem of a find.

The staff were excellent and were just delighted we were there. Normally 8 waiters but just 3 due to CV-19. We wished them well as they deserve to be successful.
reviews.title: Best Pizza we have ever tasted!!!

reviews.text:
Vegetarian friendly and at a much more affordable price compared to surrounding restaurants. Lovely outside area to eat in.
Accompanied with bread, olive oil/balsamic vinegar to start, which was a good touch. Also had no service charge, however a tip was well deserved as our server was lovely and welcoming, could not fault.
We are both pasta lovers and the aglio olio was one of the best I've tasted!! Would recommend to others.
reviews.title: One of the best pasta dishes!

reviews.text: In posizione centrale, non lontano dal Ponte di Rialto n√® da Piazza San Marco. Provato per cena di lavoro, ci siamo trovati bene anche col men√π fisso (uno di carne, l'altro commensale lo ha provato di pesce). Personale gentile, ambiente ordinato nonostante fosse abbastanza affollato. Buon rapporto qualit√† prezzo.
reviews.title: Superiore alle aspettative

reviews.text: We have been to Venice for the first time and stayws for 4 nights. The Restaurant was next door to our acommodation. We visited the Restaurant every night and were always made very welcome. We were also there on our last night were we just had some drinks. The food was very good. Especially the pizza!! The Service extremely friendly. We can recommend it without any restrictions.
reviews.title: Enjoyable

reviews.text: Ristorante a km zero rispetto al nostro hotel a due passi da piazza San Marco; personale gentile e professionale; pulizia ed ambiente pi√π che confortevole; ottima cucina ad un prezzo onesto.
reviews.title: In viaggio per il carnevale.

reviews.text: We went in as a family and were not disappointed. For us, the location was ideal and the atmosphere was serene. We tend to all order different things when in Italy, so as we can all try each others dishes. At this visit, the table had ordered a antipasto starter consisting of assorted meats and cheeses. It was delicious! As was the fried seafood appetizer. All the fish/shellfish were fresh and wonderfully presented! I recommend! Along with assorted pasta and a scallopini veal dish (which was for me...the highlight)! We drank several bottles of wine and finished with lemoncello! The staff was helpful, professional, friendly, and welcoming. You will not be disappointed with this experience!
reviews.title: Delicious food and very attentive staff!

reviews.text:
Nos dejamos enga√±ar por su men√∫s de carne y pescado a 16,50 y 19,50‚Ç¨. Lo que no nos dijo el camarero es que nos iban a cobrar m√°s por el vino que por la comida en s√≠. 
Pagamos 84‚Ç¨ por cenar, de los cuales 48‚Ç¨ fueron vino y un caf√© al m√≥dico precio de 7‚Ç¨. 

La comida estaba buena, aunque al plato de calamares le faltaban unas patatas para acompa√±ar. Las raciones son de un buen tama√±o y no te quedas con hambre. 

Si no quieres que te saquen un ri√±√≥n en la factura pide agua y disfruta la comida.

reviews.text: Great service, the food was delicious, the portions were large and the price was really affordable. The inside of the restaurant was elegant and comfortable too and they even offered biscuits and an digestive at the end. It really exceeded our expectations!

reviews.text: Si trova a 5 minuti a piedi da Piazza San Marco  , abbiamo mangiato la Pizza e onestamente non era cattiva mentre il Tortino di mele preso come Dessert era buonissimo , prezzi onesti

reviews.text:
Our group ordered the Spaghetti alla Carbonara, Salomini Pizza and Spaghetti Bolognese. The Bolognese and Pizza were good but the Carbonara was way to salty. I'm not usually one to turn away food but after 2 mouthfuls I knew I couldn't eat it all. 
I called the waiter over and he asked if I wanted a replacement meal. I decided not to as we had a Pizza which I could share.
When the bill came, I was still charged full price for the Carbonara. When queried, the waiter said that the food was not salty and that I should've told him I didn't want salt in it before they cooked it. He got rude quickly, snatched the bill from my hand and said dont worry about it. When he returned he said I had to pay half as I had eaten half of it (which I had barely touched it).
Disappointed by the service here. Wouldn't recommend.
reviews.title: Super salty Carbonara!

reviews.text:

reviews.text: This restaurant offers indoor and out door seating.  They also offer gluten free pasta and pizza.  The staff are friendly and helpful and offer a good service.  We ate he 4 times and paid between 30-60 euros based on 2 adults with one or two courses and drinks (half litre of white wine and sprite or beer).  I would definately recommend this restaurant.  It is midway between St Mark's square and the Rialto bridge so perfect location and if you sit outside you will see gondalors floating by!  Perfect. A special mention to Fahim who provided excellent service.

reviews.text: I love gourmet food and I've had plenty of real squid ink dishes and fresh spaghetti at upscale restaurants. I didn't choose to go to this restaurant, I was led here by a tour group. Anyone who knows can tell that this is obviously not squid ink LOL. I found some unground sesame bits in the sauce. At least I'm only out 25‚Ç¨ for it. I didn't eat it, it was disgusting and just tasted like salt and sesame oil. All these unfortunate tourists from China in the restaurant didn't know any better.
reviews.title: SCAM ALERT. "Squid ink" pasta was dried spaghetti drenched in ground black sesame.

reviews.text: Stay away- They are terrible.  They overcharged us.  We ordered bottle of wine which they said was $45 euro and the bill was for 85 euro  when we questioned it they said they gave us the bigger bottle. Would not correct bill.Food wasn't great.  Would not recommend

We were warmly welcomed at the Nuova Valigia. There were locals, families and tourists all eating here. The waiter staff were caring and helpful. I decided to order the fish menu of the day and decided to start with the spaghetti nero di seppia. This is pasta with squid that is coloured black with squid ink. The waiter checked to ensure that I understood what I was ordering. A caring touch.
All our food was good, the spaghetti followed by the fried calamari on my menu, and the lasagna followed by the liver venetian style. 
I would be happy to return here for another meal.

Les spaghettis aux vongole nous ont un peu d√©√ßus: pas tr√®s parfum√©s et portions peu g√©n√©reuses. Bon choix de vins.
reviews.title: Belle salle, service styl√©. Bien

reviews.text: lovely ambience, good window seat. Starters were excellent and then we had the dish of the day. This was a seafood risotto - not much seafood and tough overcooked calamaris. we complained but to no avail, it was rather take it or leave it. Sad as it was my wife's birthday.
reviews.title: disappointing meal

reviews.text:
The restaurant is pleasantly decorated but tables are very close together. We had a table for two, but the adjacent tables were extremely close, there was barely room to pass between our table and that on either side. Consequently it felt as though the people on either side were part of our table and conversation.

Service was quick and reasonably efficient. I had Spaghetti alle Vongole. The food is well prepared and presented, but unexceptional, and as good or better can be found elsewhere in the neighborhood, and probably cheaper.

I had expected better having been here a couple of years ago. On this occasion I was unimpressed, we left disappointed and feeling we had not received a meal which justified the price. This was the only disappointing meal we had during our four night stay in Venice.
reviews.title: Disappointing considering the price

reviews.text: Un restaurante muy bonito, la terraza y la vista preciosa, muy rom√°ntico. La comida muy buena. Vale la pena visitarlo.
reviews.title: Muy bien!!!

reviews.text: Au bord de la lagune, un excellent restaurant et un service agr√©able et efficace. La qualit√© pour un tres bon rapport qualit√© prix.
reviews.title: Belle surprise

reviews.text: This restaurant is very nice. The prices are a little bit high but it definitely worth it. The service is extremely bad, but the food is amazing.
reviews.title: Bad service, perfect food.

reviews.text: La Calcina restaurant had excellent preparation of our steak and veal Milanese dishes. The sides of potato and green beans were also good. The main courses were well seasoned. We had bruschette sampling for appetizers- huge lovely setting on the water. Pricey.

reviews.title: Formidable

reviews.text:
Two years ago, in September, 2018, I finally returned to Venice after a long absence. On my first evening I happened to find La Calcina and had a late glass of Prosecco in the bar area in front of the hotel. I enjoyed the atmosphere so much, the hustle and bustle of the Canal di Giudecca, where one never gets tired of watching what is going on on the water and beyond, breathtaking sunsets included, and therefore returned two days later for a great fritto misto. --- And I returned and returned, and now, after my third stay since then, the number of my visits have accumulated to quite a number. But not the sheer number is what counts, but the wonderful memories I now connect with La Calcina and make me think back often and always with a big smile and a feeling of gratitude.

Unfortunately, I have to deal with health issues not allowing me to opt freely from the menu, but with the kind help of the team we never failed to find something appropriate to make me very happy eater. For their special efforts in this respect and their warmness I would especially like to thank Signora Vera and Signor Kazi.

I will be back in December until after Christmas and already look forward to eating out at La Calcina again, this time certainly not on the ponton, but in the cosy dining room. Thank you for many special and unforgettable times, and for running a place which, in my eyes, is tailor-made for true Venice lovers. To find the very same team there every year again speaks for itself.

Mille grazie di cuore!
Angelika da Vienna
reviews.title: Venice at its best

reviews.text: Abbiamo scelto questo splendido ristorante per il nostro pranzo di matrimonio. Una sessantina fra parenti e amici gli ospiti. Corrado, il direttore, ci ha saputo consigliare nei migliori dei modi cibo (menu sia carne che pesce con ben due primi), Vino, impostazione dei tavoli, fiori e quant' altro. Complice una magnifica giornata di sole, una terrazza curata con vista mozzafiato e un servizio impeccabile tutto si √® svolto nei migliori dei modi. Grazie infinitamente. Valentina e Mattia
reviews.title: SUPER PRANZO DI MATRIMONIO

reviews.text: Das Essen war sehr gut, das Personal auch ausgezeichnet, lange keinen so ordentlichen Service mehr bekommen. Die Lage am Wasser ist auch wirklich toll man kann wirklich viel sehen. Kann man f√ºr das sch√∂ne Abendessen mit der Freundin uneingeschr√§nkt empfehlen.
reviews.title: Sehr gut, ausgezeichneter Service und Essen.

reviews.text:
My husband and I ate dinner at La Calcina twice during our 5 day stay in Venice in July and loved both meals. 

First their location is beautiful - - dining over the water with views of Giudecca island.  Watching the sunset while enjoying a lovely white wine was a perfect way to wrap up a great day of sightseeing.

Second, everything we ordered was truly delicious.  In particular we loved the linguine and clams and squid ink pasta.  I found their prices in line with the quality of the food and the beautiful location.

You won't be disappointed
reviews.title: Outdoor dining, Beautiful view, Wonderful Food

reviews.text: Oh wow . . Delicious fresh food, friendly staff, very accommodating without a reservation. If you want a sunset to die for whilst you eat, then you need to come here. I must add we sat out on their terrace over the water.
reviews.title: Came here for the sunset and to eat and drink . .

reviews.text:
Un tr√®s joli cadre avec une terrasse sur l'eau. Des mets qui sortent de l'ordinaire. 
En revanche, nous avons renonc√© au caf√© qui tardait √† venir.
reviews.title: Un tr√®s bon repas

reviews.text: Siamo venuti a cena in questo locale attirati per lo pi√π dalla bella posizione. Molto romantici i tavoli posti sulla zattera galleggiante. Bel panorama. Il personale √® gentile ma un po distratto a volte (ci hanno portato un riso del giorno che non era quello descritto). I prezzi sono accettabili per Venezia e la posizione. Il cibo non era abbondantissimo ma ok. Ho provato un risotto ai frutti di mare, zafferano e zucchine.
reviews.title: Romantica cenetta

reviews.text: Tr√®s bon restaurant de poissons. Les anti pasti sont excellents et copieux. Les sardines in soar en particulier. Le filet de thon est exceptionnel. Le personnel est attentionn√©. Rien √† redire. Il faut y aller.

reviews.text:
We booked this restaurant after visiting it earlier in the year. We wanted somewhere with a beautiful setting for a family meal after our Venetian wedding. I emailed them and had no problems reserving a table on the outdoor terrace. Unfortunately we were late arriving for our reservation but i called and they held the table for us, if not it would have ruined our wedding evening. For this i couldn't thank them enough :) 
Food is fantastic, especially the fillet steak. Service can be slow but it's still worth a visit. We will definitely return!
reviews.title: Wedding Meal

reviews.text: We stopped here after finding the restaurant recommended by our hotel was closed and I am glad that we did.  The atmosphere was lovely.  We enjoyed the sunset on the canal, watching the boats go by.  The wine list was great and all six of us enjoyed our dinners - especially the pasta with pesto and tomatoes. The parma ham and melon appetizer and the cheese plate were also delicious.  The service was prompt.  We definitely would return!
reviews.title: Beautiful canal-side location

reviews.text: enjoyed a late lunch in the sun as a group of 8, lots of superb fresh fish and chilled prosecco. service good.
reviews.title: lovely option waterside for lunch

reviews.text: La Calcina . Best location ever, but the food has no taste and flavour at all.  Risotto seafood was really bad. The fish was not fresh the shrimps overcooked and the taste disgusting. I did not eat it at all, no excuses - nothing.
reviews.title: Mediocre food

reviews.text: Beautiful location by the water with nice atmosphere. Wonderful service with helpful waiters. The food was excellent! Would definetly visit again!
reviews.title: Great resturant

reviews.text: Sur le DORSODORU , voil√† une terrasse qui attire l'≈ìil pour sa vue sur le canal de Giudecca et son trafic incessant . On essaye et nous sommes conquis . Excellent accueil ,nous avons go√ªt√© les fameuses " SARDE IN SAOR" ,  sp√©cialit√© v√©nitienne et de bonnes " spaghetti alle vongole " accompagn√© d'un Pinot grigio . Une belle carte de dessert clos ce bon repas . On passerait des heures a siroter un limoncello en guise de digestif tant le spectacle est captivant . Vraiment marcher jusque ici , car tout vaut le coup . Je recommande .

This restaurant is worth a visit for its excellent location with tables fronting right onto the lagoon. We had no issues with the service which was pleasant enough. 
The glass of ros√©/Spritz were good, the bread fresh and my spaghetti with clams very nice. My partner had a veggie lasagne which he said was ‚Äúok but not great‚Äù. We shared very decent ice-cream for pudding and had a coffee each. The bill came to ‚Ç¨69 which is not cheap for pasta and ice-cream but reasonable for the setting. I‚Äôd come back for the view as this was a very lovely final meal before we had to rush off to the airport!
reviews.title: Great view!

reviews.text: Such a shame great views but not a clue about service or food. Given a great table but halfway through the meal along came an enormous thunderstorm and the waiters rushed to clear up all the cushions that were going to get wet. Er hello what about all the paying guests still eating who had to move tables themselves. The cost of our meal ‚Ç¨200 for two would have paid for all the silly cushions. Come on guys get real you do not deserve to last.  As for lobster spaghetti with more pink peppercorns than lobster who trained the chef on flavours?

reviews.text:
D√Æner dehors sur une terrasse en face La Giudecca, un vrai bonheur ! Il est pr√©f√©rable de r√©server √† l‚Äôavance et de demander une table en bordure de l‚Äôeau.

reviews.text:
Parece un lugar de perfil bajo al lado de los grandes y car√≠simos hoteles principales de Venecia pero este hotel y restaurante es verdaderamente exquisito, elegante y encantador.

Todas las veces que voy a Venecia, en mi vida habr√© ido unas 10 veces, Trato de ir a comer al menos dos veces por estad√≠a.

La atenci√≥n es extremadamente cordial y profesional. La cocina es excelente. Su terraza sobre el canal impactante pero tambi√©n su restaurante en interiores tiene una decoraci√≥n encantadora. Siento que ese es mi lugar. Me dan ganas de llegar pero no me dan ganas de irme. Por el nivel de la atenci√≥n y de su cocina su precio es muy razonable y accesible.

Est√° fuera de toda la mediocridad que se puede ofrecer al turista en Venecia. √âste lugar es sin duda para Quienes conocen Venecia en profundidad.

Cada vez que voy a comer, me prometo que la pr√≥xima vez tambi√©n me alojar√© en su hotel. Quiero poder hacerlo y espero que sea por muchos d√≠as, porque s√© que no voy a querer irme . Hay una se√±ora que entiendo tiene una funci√≥n especial pero tambi√©n sirve en las mesas que veo a√±o tras a√±o y esta vez conversando con ella le dije que la pr√≥xima vez ser√≠a un hu√©sped del hotel. Ser√° un privilegio

reviews.text:
Visited here with my husband for our 10th wedding anniversary.
Staff were absolutely amazing and a lovely lady really looked after us. Even putting blankets on us as it was quite chilly sitting outside.
We had a 3 course meal and every course was delicious.
Price was fair for the amount we ate and drank.  Highly recommend!
