reviews.text:
The restaurant started strong with a good welcome and a great table. The appetiser were very good but having barely finished them the plate was taken away. 

The pizzas were good as was the pasta and the Fiore di Zucca was very tasty. Service not great after that -  too fast barely finished one dish before it is taken away.  
When asked about deserts the waiter dismissively spat them out and walked away. Had to call him back where he again very straight faced, listed the few options. Grumpy waiters who rush the meal. Very little ambience as well. Depends what you are after. A quick meal or a memorable evening. Don‚Äôt come for the latter.
reviews.title: The restaurant started strong

reviews.text: H√§tte eigentlich schon am Beginn Bedenken geben sollen - beim Durchlesen der Speisekarte am Eingang vom Lokal kein Interesse des Personals - einer blieb gleich gelangweilt √ºber der Sessellehne lehnend im Ruhestatus. Tisch haben wir uns selbst ausgesucht - dann kam ein Kellner. In Summe kein Interesse gezeigt, gelangweilt, unfreundlich und arrogant. Der Wei√üwein wurde zweimal beim Nachschenken auch gro√üz√ºgig auf der Tischdecke verteilt. Besteck war falsch aufgelegt - und beim Nachlegen f√ºr den Hauptgang (Pasta) kam Fischbesteck. Qualit√§t der Speisen ist o.k., Preis f√ºr das Gedeck mit EUR 5,00 zu hoch.
reviews.title: Gute K√ºche - aber das war's auch schon...

reviews.text: Cucina napoletana verace, piatti curati, materie prime di qualit√†, servizio attento, location molto bella. Offerti entr√©e e liquori i finali. Prezzi necessariamente elevati.
reviews.title: Da provare!

reviews.text: La capacit√† di accoglienza di un ristorante √® certamente una componente importante della sua valutazione. Antonio, sua moglie e i suoi figli sono tutti sempre sinceramente impegnati nel rendere la nostra esperienza presso il loro ristorante un momento piacevole e sereno. Il pesce freschissimo e sempre eccellente, le ricette della loro terra, la pasta sempre cotta alla perfezione, il fritto divino, le bruschette, gli antipasti mitici serviti con passione e amicizia rendono le serate all'acqua pazza un'occasione sempre speciale. Un po' come mangiare a casa di amici. l'Acqua pazza da sempre √® uno dei luoghi del cuore nella nostra Venezia. Un locale amalfitano che noi veneziani ormai, percepiamo come qualcosa che ci appartiene completamente.
reviews.title: Eccellenza dell'accoglienza

reviews.text: Arrivando dal Lago di Garda e lavorando proprio in questo settore, sappiamo cosa significa mangiare bene e con prodotti di prima qualit√†, ma 110,00 con lo sconto oltretutto x due antipasti, tra cui il polpo col finocchio che era pi√π finocchio che polpo, 1 primo, 1 secondo, 1 bottiglia di acqua, 1 piccola bottiglia di vino e 2 caff√® (4 euro l' uno) per non parlare di 5 euro a testa di coperto √® veramente eccessivo se non imbarazzante. Per noi mangiare bene non √® sinonimo di spendere queste cifre, nemmeno se si tratta di Venezia. Da cancellare
reviews.title: Cena

reviews.text:
Portano avanti con onore la tradizione napoletana il crudo di pesce fantastico, la pizza √® fatta con ingredienti di primissima qualit√† dal pomodoro alla mozzarella all‚Äôimpasto. La pasta lo stesso rispetta la tradizione con eccellenza.
Confermata cena di grande qualit√†
reviews.title: Bravi questi ragazzi napoletani

reviews.text: Ok, you‚Äôre in Venice and you look fir Venetian cuisine. But what if you have the opportunity to taste some Amalfi recipes? In this case, head to Acqua Pazza and enjoy a nice menu and friendly staff. They even have pizza.
reviews.title: A piece of Amalfi in Veneto.

reviews.text: Sch√∂nes und elegantes Restaurant mit vorz√ºglichem Essen. Sowohl die Fischgerichte mit Meeresfr√ºchte wie auch die Fleichvarianten sind hervorragend. Der Service klappte bei unserem Besuch perfekt und wir k√∂nnen das Restaurant ohne Einschr√§nkungen nur empfehlen. Bei einem erneuten Besuch in Venedig werden wir gerne wieder im Acqua Pazza uns verk√∂stigen!
reviews.title: Top Restaurant in Venedig

reviews.text: Id√©alement situ√©, ce restaurant est √† premi√®re vue l‚Äôendroit id√©al pour d√Æner au calme sur une tr√®s belle place. Apr√®s 4 jours √† Venise, nous avons √©t√© surpris lorsque nous avons ouvert la carte. Des prix dignes d‚Äôun relai et ch√¢teaux mais sans la qualit√©. Comptez 25‚Ç¨ pour une entr√©e et pas loin de 50‚Ç¨ pour un plat principal. Ma femme a pris une pizza √† 25‚Ç¨ qui √©tait copieuse mais loin des pizzas italiennes que l‚Äôon conna√Æt. Sauf si vous aimez dilapider votre argent dans des prestations moyennes, passez votre chemin. Il y a tant d‚Äôautres restaurants nettement meilleurs et moins chers....
reviews.title: Tr√®s tr√®s on√©reux pour des plats normaux

reviews.text:
We had a dinner at Acqua Pazza on the recommendation of our hotel. We had good meals and did not experience any of the problems mentioned by some other reviewers. The restaurant  specialises in dishes from the Amalfi coast.

The location was very convenient for us and is near the Fenice opera house. We were seated outside in the square along with most of the other customers. Only one couple was inside. Perhaps it is getting a little cool for sitting outside now that it is the middle of September. We were glad of our jackets.

We were given a complimentary amuse-bouche to start and "strawberrycello" liqueur to finish the meal. Most of the menu is fish: my grilled sea bream was delicious. Curiously it was served with a lot of grilled or roasted sliced baby courgettes. I would have preferred a little variety, but perhaps this is the Amalfi way. My wife decided to have a change from fish and chose the rigatoni with beef and capers which was very tasty. 

We shared a dessert and a half bottle of house wine and a bottle of water. The total cost was 100 euros. Service was good. We would not be unhappy to go back but there are lots of other restaurants to try in the the few days we have in Venice.
reviews.title: Amalfi-style meal in Venice

reviews.text: After having a pasta lunch. I wanted a light dinner. This restaurant is open until 11:00 and has plenty of outside dining. I had the salad mista-very basic, with oil & vinegar provided. I had the sea bream with baby zucchini sliced & salted). Prepared just with olive oil. Very moist & tasty. Prices a little on the high side.
reviews.title: Simple DishWell-prepared

reviews.text: Non avevamo mai speso pi√π  di 100 euro per mangiare due pizze margherita e una diavola ,tre bibite e un dessert. C'e' sempre una prima volta . I prezzi di questa citt√† sono da sempre troppo alti,ma francamente anche se molto  buone , restano pur sempre solo delle pizze ...
reviews.title: Buona pizza ...ma

reviews.text: Really enjoyable return to this lovely fish restaurant, with nice bon bouche nibbles to start and unlimited strawberry-cello to finish (if you could drink unlimited strawberry-cello).  Delicious pasta.  Nice to find some places are reliable!
reviews.title: Just as good as it was 10 years ago

reviews.text: Nous avons d√Æn√© dans ce restaurant situ√© sur une place au calme tr√®s belle terrasse tres bons produits. Le service est sympathique. Addition un peu √©lev√©e. Mais la qualit√© a un prix . A faire
reviews.title: Tr√®s bonne soir√©e

reviews.text:
This place is the Olive Garden of Italy. I am convinced the concierge at our hotel and others are paid off to recommend Americans and foreigners to eat here. The location is in a square with outside seating. This should be nice but it has no charm or character and is one of the ugliest squares in Venice. It‚Äôs basically umbrellas put together in a square that would never be found if not for being recommended to. There is no ambience. The service and food was the worst we had in Venice.  My husbands Melon and prosciutto was so stale and hard for 25 Euro. My eggplant parmesan was so tough i could not cut into the eggplant to eat it. I left most of it over. My kids had pizza and said the pizza they had at lunch was much better. 
When i looked around it was mostly English speaking patrons, no Italians.  We even watched a table of six sit down and then get up because no one was coming to serve them. I felt bad for our waiter, he seemed over worked and the owner did not seem like he was nice to his staff.  
We would have done better walking in and finding something on our own. I‚Äôm bummed we spent our last night in Venice with such a bad experience. BTW i am from NY where Italian food and service are good. I had other great meals in Venice. Find somewhere else. I feel ripped off by my hotel concierge.
reviews.title: Tourist trap

reviews.text:
Bel locale con ampio plateatico in campo Sant'Angelo.
Abbiamo ordinato 2 pizze: una diavola e una margherite entrambe molto gustose e di grandi dimensioni.
Infine ci sono stati offerti una bottiglietta di limoncello con deliziosi biscottini di accompagnamento.
Molto simpatico il proprietario Rocco, consiglio una chiaccherata con lui.
reviews.title: Pizza deliziosa

reviews.text: Don't be fooled by some of the good ratings, trust me. This was my mistake I ignored so many. of the bad reviews and still went and tried it....it was a horrible idea. It is a family owned restaurant...horrible service rude interaction, overpriced as I have been to two other restaurants in Venice better food better atmosphere and service and the bill was cheaper. Even in the invoice nothing is declared just basically numbers and you need to figure which one which...Long story short...there are 10000s of restaurants which serve better food..never go to Acqua Pazza
reviews.title: Bad service..food not that great..

reviews.text:
En voyage de Nice en octobre 2018 a Venise, nous nous √©tions promis avec ma femme d'√©crire avis sur ce restaurant v√©nusien qui donne sur une belle place et jouit donc d‚Äôun emplacement extraordinaire. C‚Äôest son seul point fort.  Que 10 mois apr√®s y √™tre pass√©s, nous ayons encore l‚Äôenvie de dire √† quel point nous y avons mal mang√© vous laisse √† penser combien ce restaurant peut-√™tre d√©cevant. Le mot qui vient √† l‚Äôesprit c‚Äôest pr√©tentieux et attrape touriste. Il y a en effet dans le comportement du personnel tout un th√©√¢tre, que l‚Äôon retrouve aussi dans la carte et dans la d√©coration du restaurant. L‚Äôensemble, - surtout quand on est fatigu√© apr√®s une premi√®re journ√©e √† Venise, ville o√π l‚Äôon marche beaucoup, soyez averti,  - bref tout cet ensemble donne tout d‚Äôabord une assez bonne impression. Le d√©sastre, c‚Äôest dans les assiettes qu‚Äôil se passe.  Et l√† les masques tombent.
J‚Äôavais pris des p√¢tes avec des fruits de mer qui √©taient totalement insipides et ma femme des p√¢tes √† la bolognaise qui n'√©taient pas meilleures.  Mais le pire etait a venir, car durant toute la nuit ma femme a √©t√© malade de toute √©vidence a cause de ce repas  et nous avons m√™me craint un empoisonnement alimentaire. Comme nous √©tions en plein voyage de noces, nous avons pr√©f√©r√© passer l√†-dessus et comme ma femme s‚Äôest r√©tablie le lendemain gr√¢ce √† une di√®te compl√®te, nous avons remis √† plus tard et avons voulu aller de l‚Äôavant, ce que nous avons bien fait, car nous avons d√©couvert un tr√®s excellent restaurant pas tr√®s loin ( La Feluca) o√π nous nous sommes all√©s manger ensuite quasiment tous les soirs. Si nous n‚Äôavions connu que Acqua Pazza nous aurions pens√© que la cuisine v√©nitienne est la plus surfaite du monde, mais par chance les jours suivants nous avons presque toujours bien mang√© a Venise et notre voyage de noces a √©t√© m√©morable. 
Il est toujours tr√®s d√©licat de pointer du doigt un restaurant pour la question sanitaire, mais le fait est que ma femme a pass√© une partie de la nuit √† vomir juste apr√®s √™tre sortie d‚ÄôAcqua Pazza , or elle n‚Äôest pas d‚Äôune constitution fragile, et nous n‚Äôavions pris le reste de la journ√©e que des caf√©s et des th√©s  justement pour garder l'app√©tit pour le soir.  Meme si on enl√®ve donc ce point d‚Äôinterrogation, et qu‚Äôon se base seulement sur la qualit√© gustative des plats, nous d√©conseillons  tr√®s tr√®s vivement ce pi√®ge √† touristes. C‚Äôest pourtant notre h√¥tel qui nous l‚Äôavait recommand√©, sur le principe semble-t-il √©vident de la commission per√ßue. Bref un peu tard, mais voil√† chose faite, nous avons rendu √† ce restaurant la tr√®s mauvaise soir√©e et nuit qu‚Äôil nous a fait  passer il y a dix mois.
reviews.title: Pr√©tentieux de style, mediocrissime en bouche avec en prime une nuit compl√®te √† √™tre malade comme un chien.

reviews.text: Nice restaurant inside and outside. Good food. Excellent pizza and fish baked in salt. Service itself was fine but very grumpy waiters took the shine off it.

reviews.text: Good location, indoor and outdoor, nice atmosphere. Food was very good, beats the Tourist Traps in Venice.

reviews.text: A hidden treasure! Excellent dining experience. Make sure you try the Scorpion fish and their homemade pastas, Limoncello and Melloncello! Excellent choices of wines and desserts. YUM! We were in Venice 4 nights and dined there twice!

reviews.text:
Posto incantevole, (Venezia ha sempre il suo fascino).
Servizio e cibo ottimi, cos√¨ come il rapporto con il prezzo.
Le due piccole note stonate sono: gli spazi a tavola, troppo stretti, oltre alla difficolt√† nel posare le vivande riduce notevolmente la bellezza delle portate impiantate molto bene.
Seconda nota negativa ( purtroppo complice la maleducazione di alcuni frequentatori) sono i bagni, credo meriterebbero pi√π cura.
In conclusione nel complesso bravi.
reviews.title: Basterebbero due varianti per il massimo della valutazione

reviews.text: We visited after being recommended by an Italian friend from the UK. To be fair he said the Pizzas were awesome but we chose something else which I felt wasn‚Äôt great. I had the Spaghetti and Shrimp. Whilst it tasted nice the shrimps were in their shells and resulted in little meat to go with the pasta. My wife had the lobster, again in the shell but it was quite a decent size. We had one spritz each and the meal totalled 90 Euro‚Äôs so quite pricey for what we had. However they gave a free small appetiser each and a small bottle, yes bottle, of lemoncella to finish, which was a nice touch. We did see some pizzas that induced food envy so next time, and I would go again to try the pizza, I‚Äôll go with our friends thoughts!
reviews.title: Dinner Meal

reviews.text: Eravamo un gruppo di amici. Io ho ordinato spaghetti alle vongole veraci e un filetto. Gli spaghetti non erano amalgamati bene per√≤ al dente. Vongole insipide (non c'entra con il locale). Filetto buono. Vino nella media. I napoletani ci sanno fare molto meglio con le vongole. Abbiamo speso 50 euro a persona. reviews.text: Forse il miglior ristorante di pesce a Venezia... il campo √® incantevole... il servizio impeccabile... i vari piatti cucinati in maniera divina... DA PROVARE

reviews.text:
Io e i mei nonni siamo  andati all‚Äô acqua pazza il 10 giugno il primo giorno di soggiorno a Venezia , e trovandoci cos√¨ bene siamo tornati anche la sera del 12 Giugno.
La prima sera io e mio nonno abbiamo preso gli scialatielli napoletani con cozze e cinghiale, mia nonna uno spaghetto al pomodoro.
Non essendo ancora abbastanza pieni abbiamo ordinato anche un acqua pazza, e c‚Äô√® arrivato un piatto enorme con scorfano cozze, gamberi aragoste...Avevamo paura di non finirlo talmente era grande ....
Scialatielli deliziosi...
La sera successiva ci hanno consigliato i paccheri alla granseola( eccezionali) poi abbiamo preso dolce gelato ai fruttini molto buoni, accompagnato da vino bianco falangina. Siamo stati da Re, molto educati e gentili . Ci torner√≤ . Grazie

reviews.title: Buenas pizzas y burrata

reviews.text:
When we were seated, the sun was beaming so we opted to dine outside on the terrace.  The service was prompt, friendly and professional.  All meals were fabulous - the stand-out dish was the seafood risotto - highly recommended!  It was a little more expensive than other restaurants in the immediate area, but well worth it - we paid 25 Euro for microwaved lasagna at another restaurant, so we definitely appreciated the fresh, well-cooked, well-seasoned meals here!  At the end of our meal, our waiter prepared a little treat on the house for us - a bottle of alcohol and some cookies - delicious, more-ish and very gratefully appreciated!  Just as we were finishing up, the staff began to open the umbrellas over the tables - it wasn't raining, so I asked why.  They explained rain was coming, so best to be prepared.  Sure enough, in a matter of minutes, it was pouring down with rain and not one customer felt one drop - bravo! 
 Exceptional food and service - highly recommended.
reviews.title: Great Food, Service & Location

reviews.text:
Nel centro di Venezia in una terrazza carinissima si pu√≤ mangiare pesce buonissimo.
Titolare gentile e camerieri professionali fanno da cornice ai piatti di pesce che si sono rivelati buonissimi.
Soprattutto i primi sono veramente ottimi e ben presentati.
Promosso a pieni voti.
reviews.title: Napoli a Venezia

reviews.text:
Das Ristorante und Pizzeria ‚ÄûAcqua Pazza‚Äú findet man am Campo Sant‚ÄôAngelo, unweit der Vaporettostation Sant‚ÄôAngelo (nur einige Minuten entfernt gelgen). Der Platz ist sehr weitl√§ufig (sind zwei Restaurants vorhanden), wobei das Acqua Pazza, das elegantere und mond√§nere Restaurant ist und eine Reservierung meistens empfehlenswert ist. Am Abend sollte man auf unbedingt mit langer Hose dort erscheinen, sonst wird einem der Platz verwehrt. Es sind auf dem Campo vor dem Restaurant sehr viele Tische mit bequemen Sesseln aufgestellt, die Tische sind immer sehr nett dekoriert und die Aussicht auf die H√§user und den Platz, der sehr ruhig gelegen ist, einfach sehr angenehm, das Ambiente ist dadurch sehr ansprechend. Das Innenlokal ist ebenfalls sehr nett gestaltet, ist aber meistens unbesetzt, da das Speiseerlebnis auf dem Campo von den meisten G√§sten bevorzugt wird.
Das Servicepersonal k√∂nnte zeitweise etwas freundlicher sein, manchmal wirken sie etwas √ºberheblich. Die Men√ºkarte bietet eine gute Auswahl an verschiedenen mediteranen Gerichten wie Spaghetti, Linguini in einigen Variationen an, ebenso wie Pizza und Fischgerichte etc., eine kleine aber sehr gut sortierte Weinkarte rundet das gute Angebot ab. Die Portionsgr√∂√üen sind in Ordnung, auch die Qualit√§t der Speisen ist sehr gut, der angebotene Hauswein kann empfohlen werden. Allerdings ist das Preisniveau im Acqua Pazza h√∂her als in anderen Restaurants.
Sollte diese Bewertung f√ºr Sie hilfreich gewesen sein, bitte den "Hilfreich Button" aktivieren!

ÓÇº
reviews.title: Gute K√ºche - netter Campo - Service hat Potential

reviews.text: Excellent food, great service and excellent value. Fresh local food presented well. What more can one say.

reviews.text: Wouldn't have cared about fees or final cost if either the food was great OR I had taken up a table on a beautiful day, but the place was empty.  We sat inside right before closing. reviews.text: We chose this place as it was the first one we came to from our hotel , after an early start. Quite a classy setup outside in a square. Our son polished off most of his pizza, which is high praise from him. I tried a piece and it was very good. My wife really enjoyed her spaghetti vongole. My taglinni amalfi was ok, nothing special. The house white served to us was very nice. We shared a tiramisu dessert, which was very nice. All in all a good meal. Pricey, but it is Venice, is anything good value.

reviews.text:
√âramos 7 y pedimos unos entrantes para compartir. Fue lo menos atractivo.

reviews.text: Visited during my family's week long trip to Venice at the recommendation from our concierge.  This was one of the more disappointing meals in venice, and one of the more expensive choices.  My crab pasta was salty, boring, and certainly not worth 45E.  My husbands shrimp scampi was absolutely tragic....head on shrimp that had maybe a teaspoon of meet that had to be pried from the tail....at 35E.  My son chose pizza (after hearing they have the best pizza in Venice)...not so...the crust was undercooked as was the cheese and the sauce was tasteless.  On top of the mediocre food, there was an EXCEPTIONALLY loud table next to us, with patrons yelling at the waiters to make their 200E bottle of champagne colder.  Definitely would not recommend.

reviews.text: a venezia erano anni che non ci andavamo e abbiamo optato per una gita di un girno,all'ora di pranzo ci siamo fermati in questa birreria dal nome che ricorda i nostri luoghi.Cortesia si,abbiamo scelto un menu' a prezzo fisso,ma il cibo era scadente e di scarsa qualita'.Forse perche' non era alla carta?mah! Although the food was good, we would probably have wanted to try other places, but it was him that brought us back!

reviews.text: Bonito restaurante, cobro exacto de lo consumido, no cobran uso de utensilios/cubiertos ni propina, personal muy amable; hablan espa√±ol, ambiente familiar, comida buena y satisfactoria, precios aceptables y econ√≥micos para consumir en Venecia.

reviews.text: Cena ottima, il mitico cameriere ALESSANDRO sapr√† consigliarvi al meglio, chiedete a lui e la cena sar√† strepitosa. Ristorante da provare

reviews.text: It was the last night in Venice, and we wanted to have something to drink and maybe something sweet, like tiramisu. The waiter approached us from the street (as we were a group of 10 persons) and in order to arrange us a table it nearly kicked out another two clients, just because we were a big catch for them. We really appreciated that but when we started ordering and he realised that we want only to drink some bears and some aperol and to eat only some tiramisu and two pizza's the waiter had a nearly nervous reaction and he almost obliged us to order food 'because this is an restaurant-not a bar, only for drinking'. Finally, we ordered like two pizzas and one portion of carbonara spaghetti but the waiter came from 5 to 5 minutes to ask us if we would like something else like he was trying to make us to consume more at least. Anyway because of his attitude, even the food and the sweets were really good, the whole experience was shaded by the fact that we felt that he was constantly trying to make us feel uncomfortable in order to leave sooner. Great place, but the waiter's attitude ruins it. He is kind to you only it you will have a fat bill at the end.
reviews.title: The food was good but the waiter very rude

reviews.text: This area you must check prices!!! 25 feet from this restaurant same plate was more expensive. Love the food and the service...very friendly staff

reviews.text: worst choice, poorly polite waiters, bad service and bad food, there a lot of better options in the area, I don‚Äôt recommend
reviews.title: Run away

reviews.text: We chose this place for our final meal after a wonderful three days in Venice. It was my husband's birthday so we decided to order a good red wine rather than stint on price. It arrived, it was a very dull colour and tasted awful. I asked the waiter to taste it, he refused and I referred to the manager who also refused to taste it. Oxygen had clearly got to the wine but they insisted it was fine and proceeded to ignore us for the rest of our meal. We had only ordered some snacks and cheese to go with our wine. My Pinot Grigio was equally uninspiring and all in all, I felt it was an utter tourist trap for those not wanting to walk too far from San Marco. I would NOT recommend this place to anyone. They were not interested in our complaints and just did everything they could to make us feel as though we were a nuisance. There are many good eateries in and around San Marco, this one is to be avoided at all costs.
reviews.title: Rude service and corked wine :-(

reviews.text:
Peque√±o t√≠pico lugar veneciano en la proximidad de la Piazza San Marco donde nos detuvimos a almorzar. 
Destaco la amabilidad de todo el personal, sumamente gentiles y alegres. La comida riqu√≠sima y la cerveza muy buena servida en las simp√°ticas botas. 
Los precios m√°s que razonables considerando que se trara de Venecia. Definitivamente para volver y recomendar!
reviews.title: Muy buen lugar!

We needed to repeat order and ask for what we ordered. Couple sitting next to us was having same issues. Waiter didn't write what they order. After 5min he came back and asked to repeat what they ordered. 20min after lady was still waiting for her drink. Its a shame because food was reasonably good and price isn't very expensive...

I was there with my wife for dinner.... The waiter received us with smiles and very professionally...... I can still remember his name.... Mauro. Since we're muslim, he suggested us food that suitable for us.....

To be frank the food is really delicious especially the lobster spaghetti and also blank ink spaghetti.... Really love the food so much..... After that we have dinner there almost every night.

Thank you for making our stay a memorable and beautiful one....

Congratulations to the management and all the staff.....

reviews.text:
In Italy, ‚Äúsalami‚Äù is the word for what Americans call ‚Äúpepperoni.‚Äù I ordered a veggie pizza to go (take away), and added ‚Äúsalami.‚Äù There was little effort in crafting the pizza, and it was overpriced. 

For example, instead of sliced salami, there was an inch + thick butt of the salami stick plucked down on below average pizza. I attached pictures. Who wants to eat the hardened butt?! Not only that, but the salami was ‚Ç¨3 of a ‚Ç¨10 pizza. 

As I placed my order, the guy behind the counter took out the soda and beers that were part of the order, and sat them on the counter. After realizing he was going to let the soda and beer warm up while the pizza cooked, I gently asked him to put them back in the refrigerator until my pizza was ready. He didn‚Äôt. So, I later asked again. He still didn‚Äôt. I realize that I am in another country, but I‚Äôve traveled to 7 countries besides my own, and I knew that I wasn‚Äôt asking for anything unusual or from a sense of entitlement. Finally, he eventually did put the beverages back in the cold, but I don‚Äôt understand why I had to fight this battle at all. 

When I eventually got my pizza, I said, ‚ÄúThank you.‚Äù I received no response. I said again, ‚ÄúThank you.‚Äù Still no response. This guy was close enough to me that we could shake hands, yet ignored me. 

To sum up: poor quality, rude service, unreasonable prices. What more reason might one need to avoid this place?
reviews.title: Pepperoni butt  :(

Abbiamo mangiato benissimo in un'atmosfera accogliente e amichevole. Per essere a Venezia il prezzo √® molto buono. Qualit√† eccellente. I moscardini in umido con polenta, superbi. Abbiamo fatto i complimenti al cuoco e ci torneremo senz'altro. Consigliato a tutti.

reviews.text: I was staying just next to this restaurant and as I was tired I didn't want to walk far. The reviews were great so I went there. I arrived early so no problem getting a table as it was quiet. It started well and I ordered spaghetti Nero di seppia and 1/2 litre sparkling wine. Both were excellent and I will not give a poor review of the food. But I am scoring 2 due to the service. Once the pasta and the wine came it was like I had died. I even checked my pulse once. I became invisible. I was seated right in the centre of the indoor part and both the male and female servers walked past me more than 20 times after I finished the pasta. Other "non English" diners were offered desserts and coffees and happily drank Limoncello. I left with Nothing. For nearly 30 minutes I was ignored. There was then a problem paying with card due to reception. So I paid cash and left. I felt so upset to be discriminated against like this. I saw so many Italian diners eating the tiramisu I wanted and other nationalities drinking lovely espresso. I am so sorry for being English.
reviews.title: I'm sorry I can't change my nationality

Io, per esempio, prendo sempre il fegato alla venezia ed √® buono come lo faceva mia madre. Prezzi onesti. Per Gabribecca di Venezia!!!! mi s√† dire lei un posto dove si mangia bene in citt√†? reviews.text: To cut straight to the point, we were not even offered a table even though there were clearly two four-seater empty unreserved tables amongst others that were taken. We requested a table for two and the waiter walked around, then came back to us gesturing a 'No' and indicating that both the empty tables are in fact reserved. He did not apologise, he was rude, he did not make eye contact, and he immediately went to on to put the 'reserved' signs on both tables. That was it and it was clear that both tables weren't reserved (it was already late at night past 8pm). Either they were being racist against asians or that they'd rather leave the tables for guests that come in groups of four to make better profit.
reviews.title: Would not recommend

reviews.text: After our gondola ride, we were quite chilly so stopped here for some food. Although I generally love pasta dishes, there is a wide choice of fish based and meat based pasta here, neither of which grabbed my fancy. So we both opted for pizza, a ham&mushroom and a diavolo. Both were delicious and reasonably priced. We had 2 lattes, a bottle of water and a tiramisu, all of which totalled ‚Ç¨41. Very reasonable in the centre of Venice. The staff were very attentive and didn't laugh at my attempts to communicate in their beautiful language. I always appreciate it when the Italians encourage, rather than laugh at, my attempts. A thoroughly enjoyable experience. Grazie
reviews.title: Pizza and ambience

reviews.text: Die Ostaria befindet sich in zentraler Lage. Sie ist einfach, ohne Schickimicki und sauber. Die K√ºche ist venezianisch, vielseitig und lecker. Die Preise sind fair und der Service freundlich und pronto. Also alles wie man es haben m√∂chte. Jederzeit wieder!

reviews.text:
We were very satisfied with our dinner at Ostaria a La Campana.

The food was delicious, the wine was good and our friendly hostess was very helpful when we explained her the problem my wife has with food intolerance. We gave her the list of prohibited and allowed ingredients and they prepared a salad for her using that list. The coffee after the dinner was also good.

The Ostaria a La Campana is located just a couple of minutes away from San Marco square, but the bill was only around 70 euros for the three of us.
reviews.title: A very good Ostaria

Sono tornata in questo locale dove avevo mangiato bene qualche anno fa. E non sono rimasta delusa. Piatti ben cucinati con porzioni che ti saziano. I prezzi sono assolutamente accettabili per un locale a poca distanza da San Marco. Servizio cortese.

L‚Äôunica cosa che ci ha lasciato l‚Äôamaro in bocca √® che nonostante stessimo cenando, alle ore 22,00 esatte ci √® stato negato un piatto di affettati in quanto esattamente alle 22 la cucina chiude. reviews.text: Credo che Venezia sia una delle citta' con maggiore concentrazione di ristoranti al mondo. La presenza massiccia di turisti favorisce il proliferare di ristorazione di tutti i tipi, dai tantissimi " turistici" (e piuttosto cari) a pochi di buona qualita. L' Osteria a la Campana propone una discreta cucina veneta in un ambiente rustico; i tavolini, piccoli, sono piuttosto vicini e i posti non sono molti, meglio prenotare. Personale volenteroso ma non proprio professionale, menu non molto vasto (potrebbe essere un bene). Abbiamo assaggiato tagliatelle con salsiccia e radicchio, discrete, e tortelloni di taleggio con zucca e tartufo, interessanti; poi del baccala' mantecato e fegato alla veneta.Complessivamente cena onesta ma non memorabile, rapporto qualita'/prezzo cosi' cosi', come in molti posti a Venezia.
reviews.title: Uno dei  tanti ristoranti di medio livello a Venezia

reviews.text: Visited with family in December 2018. Ordered the seafood tasting menu and some appetizers- everything was delicious and fresh! The server was courteous and friendly. House wine was very decent. The prices didn‚Äôt bite, and we got free limoncellos after the meal.
reviews.title: Great food, great service, great price!

reviews.text:
Nach einer wundervollen Woche in Venedig wollten wir den letzten Abend kulinarisch besonders ausklingen lassen. So sind wir ins Lineadombra gegangen.
Die Atmosph√§re auf dem Ponton gegen√ºber der Guidecca ist genial.
Die Mitarbeiter sind sehr zuvorkommend, reichen Men√ºkarte und Weinbuch!
Aus der √ºbersichtlichen Men√ºkarte, eigentlich ein gutes Zeichen, w√§hlten wir jeder eine andere Vorspeise und ein anderes Hauptgericht aus. Dazu eine gute Flasche Wein.
Wir freuten uns auf das Besondere. Leider waren wir entt√§uscht. Optisch ausgezeichnet, aber leider kam kein  Genuss auf. Dieses Essen entsprach nicht unseren Erwartungen. Es fehlte der besondere Geschmack, ein Boah-Erlebnis.
Mein Mann nahm noch ein Dessert - Creme Karamell, Ananascarpaccio und Macedamian√ºsse - es war ok, aber 14 ‚Ç¨
Das Preis/Leistungsverh√§ltnis stimmt leider nicht. Schade. Bei etwas √ºber 200 ‚Ç¨ hatten wir mehr erwartet.
Den vielen guten Bewertungen nach, ist die Qualit√§t der K√ºche wohl doch sehr wechselnd.
reviews.title: In bester Lage am Zattere ist dieses moderne Restaurant

reviews.text:
Lineadombra... Ce beau restaurant est situ√© au bout du quai des Zattere, l√† o√π l‚Äôombre se s√©pare de la lumi√®re...
On est face √† la Giudecca et √† la Chiesa del Redentore.
La terrasse est sur l‚Äôeau, les deux salles sont intimes et sont sobrement d√©cor√©es l‚Äôune en blanc, l‚Äôautre en rouge.
Le personnel est exquis ! Grande classe ! Vous savez, le naturel avec ce qu‚Äôil faut de retenue... on pourrait appeler cela: √©l√©gance.
La belle assiette de poissons et fruits de mer avec un chardonnay au verre, ou l‚Äôoctopus avec un pinot du frioul sont d√©licieuses !
La cr√®me br√ªl√©e chocolat est l√©g√®re comme l‚Äôananas qui l‚Äôaccompagne...!
On est avec une excellente cuisine, dans un restaurant o√π tout est courtois (!) et l‚Äôensemble permet de passer un moment √† la mesure de la ville... et c‚Äôest tr√®s haut, comme le disait Casanova.

reviews.text:
Wir fahren mit dem Vaporetto von San Zaccaria zur Basilika Santa Maria della Salute und nach ein paar Schritte sitzen auf einer der beeindruckendsten Terrassen der Stadt. Die achteckige barocke Kuppelkirche im R√ºcken lassen wir unsere Blicke √ºber den abendlichen Giudeccakanal schweifen, bevor wir ganz in der au√üergew√∂hnlichen Weinkarte mit 1000 hervorragenden Eintr√§gen aus der ganzen Welt versinken. Der begeistert vorgetragene Speisenempfehlung folgen wir und wir werden es nicht bereuen. Das Crudo di mare ist die perfekte Einstimmung f√ºr diesen sch√∂nen, genussvollen Abend.
Wir werden ganz bestimmt wieder kommen ....

reviews.text: Was wir hier genossen haben, hat kulinarisch √ºberzeugt. Die Bedienung sehr aufmerksam, die empfohlenen Weine harmonisierten vorz√ºglich mit den exzellenten Speisen. F√ºr mich stimmte das Preis-Leistungsverh√§ltnis. Ich kann dieses Restaurant empfehlen. Danke f√ºr einen wundervollen Abend.

reviews.text:
F√ºr unser letztes Abendessen in Venedig haben wir das Lokal wegen seiner Terasse und der Aussicht ausgew√§hlt. Da wir fr√ºh da waren, mussten wir nicht reservieren, dies ist sonst empfehlenswert. Das Personal ist freundlich und zuvorkommend und ber√§t einem in Getr√§nke- und Speisefragen kompetent. Wir haben uns f√ºr den Fang des Tages entschieden. Dies reicht gut f√ºr 2 Personen. Wir wurden auf die Wartezeit f√ºr unser Essen hingewiesen, was hilfreich war. Um die Zeit bis dahin zu √ºberbr√ºcken wurden uns neben dem √ºblichen Brot noch zwei Gr√ºsse aus der K√ºche gebracht, einerseits eine kleine Tomatensuppe mit Shrimpmouse und andererseits gebratener Tintenfisch (dieser verging auf der Zunge) auf einem Erbsenpesto.
Beides lie√ü auf einen sehr leckeren Hauptgang hoffen. 
Diese Hoffnung wurde kurz darauf erf√ºllt und wir erhielten unsere Seabrass aus dem Ofen. Der Fisch wurde optimal filetiert und  serviert. Als Beilage bestellten wir einen kleinen gr√ºnen Salat. Auch diese Speisen waren sehr fein und von hoher Qualit√§t. Da die Speisen sehr reichhaltig und mengenm√§√üig gross waren, wollten wir nur einen kleinen Dessert - somit fragten wir nach Eis. Obwohl nicht auf der Karte gab es ein vorz√ºglichliches Zitroneneis, genau richtig um den Abend perfekt abzurunden. Preis Leistung ist in meinen Augen in Ordnung, denn die Speisen waren frisch und von sehr guter Qualit√§t.
reviews.title: Ausklang des Urlaubes

reviews.text:
Ogni volta che andiamo a cena a Venezia mi piace scoprire ristoranti nuovi, questo sicuramente √® uno dei migliori.
Ha letteralmente tutto vista sul canale di Giudecca cibo ottimo con un pizzico di modernit√† personale molto gentile e cordiale.
Abbiamo preso su consiglio del cameriere due piatti di crudit√† veramente fresco e ben presentato poi i bigoli alle vongole e mandorle davvero superlativo e per finire il dolce una millefoglie al mango davvero eccezionale.
Per il vino ci siamo affidati al consiglio del cameriere e non abbiamo sbagliato.
Da ritornare....
reviews.title: Cena Romantica

reviews.text:
Arriv√© par hasard lors d'une promenade, nous avons √©t√© imm√©diatement s√©duit par le cadre et l'ambiance du restaurant. Sans trop d'illusion nous avons demand√© une table et quelle dut notre surprise quand le chef a demand√© malgr√© que le restaurant √©tait complet d'am√©nager une table pour 4 personnes.
La carte est vari√©e, nous avons ador√© tant les entr√©es que le plat principale et les desserts, un vrai d√©lice. Raffinement et produits frais sont au rdv
On recommande sans mod√©ration.
reviews.title: Excellent !

reviews.text: Un restaurant qui fait du bien, de l'air, la mer, le calme, une cuisine classe, excellente, soign√©e...tout est bon
reviews.title: A√©r√©, beau, classe

reviews.text: Looked for a lovely restaurant to celebrate our anniversary and this certainly was, with the terrace set out over the water looking south over to Giudecca island.  Far less busy than the Grand Canal it was a beautiful setting for dinner.  We started with a complimentary amuse-bouche serving of Gaspacho, mildly spiced but served with some basil oil and creme fraiche it was very tasty.  Starters had Burratta served on Artichoke  heart which was very nice and Vongole pasta which was excellent.  Mains were a fillet of turbot on a bed or raw baby spinach.  Fish was good but slightly overcooked.  Other main was lobster pasta which was fabulous.  Excellent rich tomato sauce with delicate well cooked fresh lobster.  Finished off with shared chocolate creme br√ªl√©e.  Very nice but was supposed to have hint of lavender, but no sign of it.  Served with very thin pineapple slices which were lovely, again supposedly infused with herbs, but not noticeable.  Wine list is huge and so are the prices to go with it.  Had a good recommendation on a white wine from the Alto Adige region and enjoyed.  Overall a lovely evening, but would expect nothing less at this price!  Would recommend though.
reviews.title: Beautiful setting and lovely food

reviews.text:
Difficile trovare un consiglio da dare ai gestori di questo locale: location strepitosa, servizio ottimo e materie prime eccellenti abbinate e preparate in maniera magistrale!!!! Davvero bravi
Sicuramente non si tratta di un ristorante low cost ma il prezzo pagato √® garanzia di qualit√†.
reviews.title: Impossibile non tornare...

reviews.text: Me and my friend sat down on the terrasfor a drink after visiting de Basilica Madonna della Salute. Excellent service and a magnificent view! It looks pricy, but the location and attention to details is worth it.
reviews.title: Most beautiful terras of Venice

reviews.text: Come scritto un p√≤ da tutti, la location √® bellissima con vista Giudecca. Abbiamo preso una burrata e cappesante come antipasti, come primi un pacchero con mazzancolle e della pasta senza glutine con pesce spada. Tutto buono, forse sui primi si potrebbe precisare che non erano molto "legati" per i nostri gusti (sulla pasta senza glutine ci pu√≤ stare, sul pacchero meno). Personale gentilissimo e disponibile. Ci hanno offerto un refill del vino essendo passata quasi un'ora tra l'entr√©e e l'antipasto. Ci pu√≤ stare, sabato sera e sala piena. Sui prezzi potrei dire che sono alti, ma non frequentando spesso Venezia non saprei. Forse sono esagerati i 5‚Ç¨ per coperto (nonostante la location).
reviews.title: Bellissimo posto

reviews.text: abbiamo pranzato oggi, attratti dalla location con terrazza direttamente sul canale della giudecca. Personale gentile e rispettoso delle normative covid,vi consiglio gli spaghetti all'astice blu, prezzo indubbiamente non turistico (45 euro) ma li vale.
reviews.title: Location meravigliosa

reviews.text: Davvero nulla da rimproverare,10 e lode. Location fantastica (terrazza che guarda direttamente sul canale), cibo eccellente e camerieri disponibili e simpatici!
reviews.title: Cena perfetta

reviews.text:
Ottimo ristorante per la bellissima location affacciata sul canale della Giudecca, per l‚Äôatmosfera raffinata e rilassante e non ultimo per la qualit√† della cucina.
Da non perdere il freschissimo assortimento di pesce crudo ed i primi di pasta fatta dallo chef, tra i quali i bigoli alle vongole per cottura e sapore.
Interessante e completa la carta dei vini (anche se manca l‚ÄôOrto di Venezia), ma con prezzi esageratamente alti, e non stiamo parlando di un ristorante Stellato, almeno per ora.
Servizio perfetto e professionale, prezzi alti da coerenti con il livello del locale e con la qualit√† proposta. Consigliabile.
reviews.title: Atmosfera romantica per una cucina di qualit√†

reviews.text:
Ci sono stato ieri sera per festeggiare il compleanno della mia compagna.
Servizio di grande professionalit√†, cibo squisito e location TOP.
√à un ristorante di alta qualit√†, l'ideale se si vuole stare in pace e in tranquillit√† senza schiamazzi.
reviews.title: Un posto magico

reviews.text: Non ho molto da dire, la luna parla per noi; aggiungo  solo estrema soddisfazione per la qualit√† dei cibi e del vino, la cortesia e la disponibilit√≤ del personale in particolare di Alice,  e ovviamente la location. Spero di ritornare il prossimo compleanno importante o comunque la prossima volta a Venezia
reviews.title: I miei primi 70 anni al top

reviews.text: Recensito su guida Michelin sembra strano che non abbia ancora almeno una stella. Tutto √® perfetto: mise en place, servizio, cura e attenzione del cliente. Il cibo √® ottimo, materia prima freschissima e cotture e/o lavorazioni uniche. Infine, la location: unica!
reviews.title: Merita una stella!

reviews.text:
Ristorante molto raffinato,  terrazza sul canale e servizio cortese ed attento. 
Ottime pietanze e cantina molto fornita. Felici di aver speso molto bene i nostri soldi perch√© quando tutti gli ingredienti per una cena si fanno ricordare ne vale davvero la pena!
reviews.title: Eccellente

reviews.text:
Atmosfera perfetta, servizio impeccabile, io e la mia famiglia abbiamo mangiato per la prima volta in questo ristorante che non ha deluso le nostre aspettative; anzi, ci ha piacevolmente stupiti e sorpresi.
Abitiamo a Venezia da 5 anni e pur avendo sentito parlare bene di questo ristorante da amici veneziani, non lo avevamo ancora provato. Ebbene, probabilmente d'ora in avanti sar√† una nostra tappa fissa.
Abbiamo mangiato dei bigoli all'astice azzurro che erano strepitosi (un piatto unico con 250 grammi di astice a testa) e abbiamo bevuto un ottimo vino della Valle d'Aosta. 
Il ristorante ha una carta dei vini amplia ed eccezionale.
I prezzi sono in linea con il servizio impeccabile, la qualit√† del cibo, e la location da 10 e lode. 
Abbiamo cenato in tanti ristoranti a Venezia e questo certamente √® tra i pi√π buoni che per ora abbiamo effettivamente provato.
Anche i dolci sono ottimi.
reviews.title: Una cena strepitosa !!!

reviews.text: Derzeit ohne Kreuzfahrtschiffe ein wunderbarer Abend. Essen (trotz 4‚Ç¨ Zeichen) perfektes Preis- Leistungsverh√§ltnis. Umfangreiche Weinkarte. Genialer Fisch und. - wer mag - the one and only Fegato. Service von Herzen freundlich. Sonderw√ºnsche kein Thema.
reviews.title: Romantik pur

reviews.text:
Ho portato la mia ragazza appena ho saputo che il Lineadombra aveva riaperto 
Atmosfera idilliaca in una Venezia magica in questo periodo. Cibo ottimo . Io ho avuto pesce crudo come antipasto servito con delle salse a parte  molto delicate  e poi ho diviso un branzino al sale con la mia ragazza. Camerieri giovani molto simpatici e professionali . Lista vini assolutamente incredibile !!!
reviews.title: Personale sempre cordiale

reviews.text: Piatti buonissimi e vini consigliati dal nostro cameriere, vista mozzafiato, il tempo √® letteralmente volato! Consigliatissimo.
reviews.title: Vista mozzafiato

reviews.text:
Qualit√† del cibo altissima....
Servizio disastroso.
2.30h per mangiare antipasto e secondo.
1h di tempo per vedere del pane al tavolo e la bottiglia di champagne ordinata.
reviews.title: Qualit√† del cibo altissima....

reviews.text: Un restaurante montado sobre una plataforma en el canal en una de las zonas mas abiertas de Venecia. Buena comida y vistas maravillosas. Un lujo al alcance de muchos.
reviews.title: Las mejores vistas de la Giudeca

reviews.text: Not the cheapest in town but lovely  good weather site and tasty food with favourites with a modern twist
reviews.title: Wonderful Venetian favourite with a new twist

reviews.text: This is a great restaurant away from the swarming tourists.  We had a lovely table on the water with a great view.  Food is delicious. Perfect recommendation.
reviews.title: Fantastic Food - Lovely Afternoon

reviews.text: Considering the recent aqua alta in Venice, these guys did amazingly well to be open at all - and to appear as if nothing had happened. Dining indoors on a chilly winter's evening isn't quite the same as enjoying the sunshine on their lovely outdoor jetty, but we had an excellent and imaginative dinner. the menu is quite short, creative and carefully prepared, with relaxed but professional service- it's a serious restaurant, but they manage to keep it feeling informal.
reviews.title: Contemporary and creative

reviews.text: Lineadombra (a Rick Steves recommended establishment), though quite pricey, was our BEST meal while in Venice. That is really high praise, since we had several great meals during our trip. This fine dining establishment fully met our expectations despite the high prices. Ricardo served us and did an outstanding job. The menu is quite interesting with an A+ accompanying wine list. As we were treated to amazing waterside views across to the island of Giudecca, we dined on veal chop, veal liver, Amarone by the glass and coffee infused tiramisu. Rick Steves says this is one of only a few places in Venice worth splurging for the view. He is absolutely right, as usual!
reviews.title: Fine Dining and Waterside Views

reviews.text: If you are looking for a quiet location a bit secluded from the tourists in Venice, it's probably a good choice , probably better at lunch, when the sun bathe the terrace. In October at night it was very quiet ; we could still sit on the terrace.
reviews.title: Lunch or dinner in Venice at the waterside

reviews.text: Posizione stupenda, ovviamente per mangiare fuori bisogna andare durante la bella stagione. Vista suggestiva e ottime pietanze. Gentilezza e cortesia del personale, ottima lista dei vini. Prezzo proporzionato considerato il livello alto del locale
reviews.title: Ottimo

reviews.text: Great wine list and wonderful menu choices.  Ravioli was a standout whilst my partner had the octopus and was pleased. Service was perfect.
reviews.title: Excellent!

reviews.text: Sono stata a cena in questo ristorante  una sera con un'amica , sapevamo perfettamente che tipo di ristorante fosse: costoso e ricercato , ma la vista valeva la pena . Al momento di ordinare il metre ci consiglia come antipasto un piatto fuori men√π :crudo di pesce , accettiamo .Ci arriva un piatto rettangolare molto grande con tre gamberi rossi di Sicilia , un ostrica, un piccolo medaglione di tonno , uno di branzino e altri due gamberi rosa , tutto molto buono ,ma decisamente porzione di antipasto .Al momento del conto vediamo che quel piatto costava 40 euro a testa !!!! Non abbiamo trovato corretto il comportamento del metre , tutto il cibo era ottimo , come il servizio ,ma ci siamo sentite decisamente prese in giro , siamo turiste !!!!
reviews.title: Attenzione al men√π

reviews.text: Nel marasma dei ristoranti di Venezia un posto dove la seriet√† e la qualit√† sono di casa. Favorito da una location eccellente (sul Canale della Giudecca con vista sulla chiesa delle Zitelle etc), tovaglie pulite personale professionale nonch√© piatti a prezzo adeguato per i posto. Men√π vario e buoni vini. Per avere la lode questo ristorante dovrebbe cercare (a mio parere) di di essere un po' pi√π semplice nei condimenti e - se proprio vogliamo - salutare il cliente che lascia il ristorante dopo aver pagato il conto ( mi rivolgo al proprietario o capo cameriere). Stefano R.
reviews.title: Gran buon ristorante nel luogo pi√π bello di Venezia

reviews.text:
The restaurant is on the waterfront and there‚Äôs a fabulous view from every table. 
This is the terrace, but it does have an indoor space which has a quirky decor.
The food is delicious: I had a fabulous burrata and a seafood pasta dish and both did not disappoint.
The menu is simple dishes with a twist and the service is impeccable.
reviews.title: Lunch vita a view

reviews.text:
"Good restaurant with a view" is almost a contradiction in terms, but that is what Linea d'Ombra is.  We had dinner here at the recommendation of our hotel.  The view is everything the other reviews say.  The outside dining area is on a deck built right at the water's edge.  There is lots of boat traffic that adds interest to the view.  The view was lovely after dark, but if you are really after the view, it probably would be better at lunch -- light reflecting off the partial glass wall around the dining area tended to obscure the view a bit. 

We found the food quite good.  Of our four dinners in Venice, this was the best.  The service was attentive but not rushed, which is what we like.  The prices were higher than some other places, but did not seem out of line given the combination of quality and view.

We would return if we visit Venice again.
reviews.title: Good food, great view

reviews.text: √à Chiara l‚Äôambizione di fare alta cucina  .  Avendo appurato che la brigata √® abbastanza giovane c‚Äô√® speranza che le intuizioni e i meriti indiscutibili possano arricchirsi del tocco in pi√π che a mio avviso manca ancora . Molto buone le capesante , la nocetta di vitello la piovra arrostita e il semifreddo Bellini ma tutti i pianti da noi provati potrebbero conseguire con qualche accorgimento l‚Äôeccellenza . Conto al limite e decisa nota stonata 10 ‚Ç¨ di coperto con Una proposta di pane, grissini e taralli decisamente inadeguata al livello del locale .
reviews.title: Essendo giovani una speranza

reviews.text:
We had a very unpleasant experience here, despite the great location and the bay view. 
The prices are extremely high for an average-quality meal. Will never come back, such a disappointment. Can't understand where all the good reviews come from!
reviews.title: Please avoid this restaurant !

reviews.text: This restaurant was recommended by a friend-of-a-friend who lives p/t in Venice and says it's the first place she and her husband go for lunch upon arriving in Venice if the weather is nice, so they can sit on the deck "and watch the ships come in."  So I booked it for my 70th bday dinner (6 Sept 2019), but due to the near-hurricane weather prevailing that day, we obviously couldn't sit on the deck.  Alas.  Nevertheless, the food and service were wonderful, and the interior decor stylish and contemporary...made for a very happy bday dinner, the weather notwithstanding.  Pricey.  Rez strongly recommended.
reviews.title: Stylishly delicious

reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic place with an incredible terrace and therefore view. Food was also incredibly good! And finally and also as important, great service.
reviews.title: Definitely go there!

reviews.text: Chose restaurant as very close to hotel and was not disappointed. Great view across the water and enjoyed watching the boats. Lovely fine dining: very good gluten free bread and they could adapt menu well to cater for gluten free.  Staff very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Lovely views and excellent meal

reviews.text: Ristorante molto bello e curato con terrazza panoramica unicaaaa!!! Cenare al lume di candela in questo meraviglioso posto √® davvero il massimo che si pu√≤ trovare a Venezia!!! Pietanze ottime, crudi freschissimi, dolci da 10 con lode e lista vini veramente unicaaaa!!! Personale preparato, professionale e Gentile oltre che di bella presenza, complimenti ragazzi .. anche i baffi hanno il suo perch√©!!! Rapporto qualit√† prezzo buono, siamo nel posto pi√π suggestivo di Venezia....lo consiglio vivamente!
reviews.title: Fuori dal caos ..

reviews.text: La bont√† del cibo non ha bisogno di ulteriori recensione; Camerieri e staff di alto livello, professionali e preparati. Complimenti.
reviews.title: Camerieri professionali

reviews.text:
This restaurant has it all; a great location, views, a sense of style, great waitstaff and delicious food.
One of our party is a vegan and they were extremely accommodating.
We had many different dishes, probably too many as there were so many appealing choices.
reviews.title: Excellent Experience

reviews.text: Waren abends dort essen und hatten einen Tisch auf der Terrasse reserviert. Die Lage ist toll, Service und Wein waren super! Das Essen sah fantastisch aus, geschmacklich h√§tte ich bei den Preisen allerdings etwas mehr erwartet!
reviews.title: Tolle Lage

reviews.text:
A lovely waterside setting behind the Basilica di S. Maria della Salute overlooking the Giudecca. A perfect spot, particularly in July for the Redentore festival. 

We were lucky to get a waterside table and a complimentary Bellini with our amuse bouches. Both lovely.  Our food was interesting and beautifully prepared and the service extremely good. 

Definitely not a cheap place to eat but the location justifies a small premium as does the food and service. Well worth a visit for a special occasion.
reviews.title: Perfect waterside setting

reviews.text: Fue un gran descubrimiento, nos lo hab√≠an recomendado en Espa√±a y la verdad es que fue un acierto. El trato del personal fue correcto y absolutamente profesional. Lo que lamentamos fue no poder comer en la terraza flotante del canal que ya habr√≠a sido espectacular. Tomamos de entrada chipirones, espaguetis con langosta y solomillo de ternera. Los tres platos magn√≠ficamente presentados y aunque las raciones puedan parecer peque√±as salimos muy satisfechos del restaurante. Ah! De postre yo tom√© una creme brule espectacular!!
reviews.title: Rom√°ntico y tranquilo

reviews.text: La posizione rimane meravigliosa ed il cibo molto buono.Questa volta ho provato strozzapreti con scorfano,lime e zucchine ( ottimi),rana pescatrice con erbette ( buona ma la quantit√† di pesce era un po‚Äô ridotta) e semifreddo Bellini ( con pesca e spumante).Eccessiva la ricarica sui vini.Ho abbassato di un punto il punteggio perch√© le porzioni questa volta mi sono sembrate troppo scarso rispetto al prezzo ( la rana pescatrice 34 euro)
reviews.title: Una conferma

reviews.text: Beautiful location, in a restaurant one of our guides recommended.  Great view, overlooking the waterways of Venice, near Salute.  Food was very good, with my wife and I sharing a salt-baked sea bass.  The only negatives are that the prices are a little high and there is a five Euro "cover charge" per person, which is the highest we encountered on our visit.
reviews.title: Dinner on Our Last Night in Venice

reviews.text: Un luogo magico , come lo √® Venezia . Nella bella stagione poter mangiare sulla terrazza , sull'acqua , con la chiesa del Redentore di fronte e l'isola di San Giorgio di  fianco , a due passi da punta della Dogana √® una esperienza unica , L'ambiente √® accogliente e moderno , il personale cortese e professionale , il cibo ottimo come lo sono gli ingredienti . Piatti curati , innovativi nel rispetto della tradizione , ben impiattati , un piacere per la vista ed il palato . Corretto il rapporto qualit√† prezzo , tenuto anche conto del luogo e della posizione .
reviews.title: E' sempre un piacere

reviews.text: Stunning Restaurant offering Grand Canal seaside tables with many local specialties on offer. We ordered a raw seafood platter which was incredibly fresh and delightful and a pasta dish called paccheri which was served with tasty prawns, olives and tomato sauce. The staff were informative, professional and new a lot about the local history. We enjoyed a memorable lunch. Hope to return again.
reviews.title: Perfect Summers day Lunch Venue watch the world float by...

reviews.text: rigtig god mad p√• restaurant p√• ponton i havet t√¶t p√• santa maria dek salute og kunstmuseet ved Ponte de Dogana . Kan bestemt anbefales. Rimelig pris i forhold til kvalitet.
reviews.title: Fremragende restaurant med god udsigt

reviews.text: Our hotel recommended Lineadombra when I said we wanted a good seafood restaurant with a water view for our daughter who had never been to Venice before.  The restaurant did not disappoint on either count.  I did read the reviews, some underwhelming, about the food+service but we had a totally different experience. The restaurant had a hard open at 7pm (we were about 15 min early so hung out while the staff was having their communal dinner).  From the start, we had attentive and informative service (we joked that we loved their blue shirts) and our server could not have been better.  They recommended a Prosecco by the glass which was astoundingly good.  We ordered the gnocchi appetizer and a crisp, fresh green salad, which were delightful.   Main dish was a whole sea bass, prepared in a salt crust, which they presented prior to opening it up to serve, and I must admit, as a fish enthusiast and connoisseur, it was one of the best we have ever had. Vegetables were fresh, crisp and tasty.  We liked Lineadombra so much, we recommended this restaurant to friends who were traveling to Venice about a week later.
reviews.title: What A View! Wonderful Meal.

reviews.text:
We had dinner with my lover at this place in August. It is a medium walk from San Marco (women better not use high hills!). 
The location is magic: sitting on a terrace on a main Venice‚Äôs canal (Giudecca) overlooking the Giudecca Island. 
For the Wine Lovers: the wine list is Amazing!
Food is fresh, Mediterranean with some Venezia‚Äôs old recipes. 
Service is great too. 
Only Minus: those bloody cruisers that from time to time pass along the Canal.... we all hope that they will soon stop this finding alternative navigation ways....
reviews.title: Beautiful Place in the Heart of Venice... despite the cruises

reviews.text: Treated myself to a more expensive restaurant than usual on my last night in Venice after having food in smaller, more-casual establishments.  The view was virtually unobstructed across the water that provided a serene atmosphere for drinks and dinner.  Unfortunately, the food was average and seemed to value fussy presentation over taste.  The service started off engaging but my table and others around me were quickly forgotten.  Our servers walked by our tables often on their way to a large party but failed to even glance over and check-in without being flagged down multiple times as if they could only focus on a single task at a time.  I consider my payment at this establishment as a payment for the view not a memorable dinner.
reviews.title: Outstanding view but underwhelming service + food

reviews.text: Maden var virkelig l√¶kker, betjening i verdensklasse. Udsigten var uden sammenligning, men prisen er lidt h√∏j. Men man g√•r hvad man betaler for.
reviews.title: 2 dage i Venedig

reviews.text:
Auf der gediegenen Terrasse am Giudecca Kanal l√§sst es sich prima speisen. Mittags am Besuchstag (24.7.) war der Andrang √ºberschaubar und im Service alles entspannt korrekt.
Das empfohlene Men√º au√üerhalb der Karte zeigte sich als gute Wahl, wenngleich zu gehobenen venezianischen Preisen (3 G√§nge plus kleine Gazpacho, 3 Getr√§nke 117.-)
Nette Ober beherrschen ihr Metier.
reviews.title: Willkommene Auszeit vom Rummel

reviews.text: La Linea d'ombra dipone di un locale al chiuso e di una piattaforma sull'acqua dalla quale si gode una vista mozzafiato su San Giorgio e La Giudecca. Gi√† questo giustifica la scelta. In pi√π, la cucina √® molto curata, con piatti mai banali. Pesce cotto alla perfezione. Personale gentile e semplice. E' un locale costoso, ma il prezzo √® del tutto adeguato a quel che offre. Ideale per una serata da ricordare.
reviews.title: Collocazione splendida. Cucina raffinata

reviews.text:
*we had dinner at Lineadombra for Redentore so this review might not be indicative of the experience on other days

The location is spectacular and ideal to watch the Redentore fireworks. The service was nice and efficient. The price is high (EUR 350 per person) but includes drinks and, again, a view that is second to none. 

The food that evening was ok but really nothing to call home about.

We already look forward to visit again to sample the burrata people are raving about.
reviews.title: Amazing location. Average* food.

reviews.text:
Right over the guidecca canal; a great spot to watch the world go by and very romantic.

We had a fabulous meal with great service.  Pricey but good.  Would recommend to friends.
reviews.title: Fab location

reviews.text:
Nous y sommes arriv√©s par hasard pour nous abriter car la pluie est soudainement tomb√©e avec renfort de gr√™lons sur les coups de 18h30 ! L‚Äôequipe mangeait et acceptait que nous nous abritions avant le service en nous offrant un ap√©ritif ! 

Nous y avons donc mang√© et nous ne furent pas d√©√ßus ! Tr√®s bon et bon rapport qualit√© prix ! 
Bonne adresse sur Venise avec un service de grand qualit√©
reviews.title: Excellent !

reviews.text:
Junto √° Dogana e Santa Maria de la Salute um belo terra√ßo sobre o canal da Giudecca. Uma boa escolha para o final do dia. N√£o √© barato, mas o padr√£o √© alto. Excelente servi√ßo, com op√ß√µes vocacionadas para o mar. Carta de vinhos estilo cat√°logo extenso, bem elaborada.
Comida com qualidade e saborosa. Pre√ßos ajustados para ocasi√£o especial.
reviews.title: Belo final de visita

reviews.text: Linedombra did not disappoint.  We had arrived from Canada that day and I chose Lineadombra because of it's great reviews and because it was only a 10 min walk from our hotel (SINA Centurion Palace).  It is beautifully situated on the Guidecca canal.  I reserved over a month in advance and requested a corner terrace table to have an uninterrupted view.  We were given our table - which was greatly appreciated.  The service is excellent and low key.  The food was delicious.  The wine selection and their recommendations were excellent (WS Awards for 8 years!) The interior design of the restaurant and washrooms is very modern, clean and cool.  We could not have asked for a better first evening!  We will return for sure.
reviews.title: An absolutely wonderful first night in Venice

reviews.text:
The burrata was sublime. Nothing else matters now. Nothing matters at all. 

Although I must say I didn‚Äôt like the pineapple on the tiramisu. Maybe that matters.
reviews.title: The burrata....holy moly artichokey

reviews.text:
It‚Äôs a beautiful stroll from the main island, across the Academia Bridge, to the restaurant. It can also be reached by water taxi. Once there the view is incredible and truly relaxing. 5 stars on that front all the way. 

The food is excellent in most cases and in others just good-very good. All in all I would rate the food a 4 1/2. There is no reason to be in a rush with a view like this. Still, the service could be a little more focused. Some folks have viewed the restaurant as overpriced. Considering the location and quality I would not agree but it‚Äôs also not a great value. 

Many exceptional aspects and an excellent evening but overall a 4 of 5 rating.
reviews.title: Magical Setting Outside the Crowds

reviews.text: My second time to visit Lineadombra - i made a point of going back after a 5 year absence. I was not disappointed.  The food is fresh, service low key, and setting was beautiful (even though we had to eat inside the restaurant because it was raining).  I'll go back upon my next trip to Venice.
reviews.title: This should be #1

reviews.text: Nous avons attendu une heure entre les hors d'oeuvres et le plat principal, et quand les plats sont arriv√©s, ils √©taient ti√®des! Deux clients italiens qui sont arriv√©s apr√®s nous, ont √©t√© servis nettement plus rapidement: il y a √† l'√©vidence une discrimination en faveur de certains clients. Le patron, auquel nous avons fait la remarque, s'est imm√©diatement √©nerv√©, devenant tr√®s d√©sagr√©able. Un endroit √† ne pas recommander.
reviews.title: Trop cher pour la qualit√© globale du service et de la nourriture

reviews.text: La vue sur la Guidecca est fabuleuse et le ballet des bateaux enchanteur. La cuisine est raffin√©e et les produits remarquablement frais. Le service est particuli√®rement attentif. Mais pourquoi de tels prix d√©raisonnables pour les vins ? Une √©nigme. On y reviendra quand m√™me.  Bravo.

reviews.text:
This restaurant offered beautiful views and delicious food .
The service was outstanding ! We had the pasta and scorpion fish with lemon , it was the perfect flavor in every bite .
reviews.title: Beautiful Views !

reviews.text:
Le meilleur restaurant de Venise que nous avons test√©. 
Un tr√®s beau d√Æner aux chandelles au bord de l‚Äôeau ou m√™me ... sur l‚Äôeau ! La gastronomie v√©nitienne majestueusement coordonn√©e dans l‚Äôassiette ou les go√ªts sont multiples. 
Tr√®s belle soir√©e 
Nous regrettons simplement l‚Äôarrogance du manager qui nous a directement refus√©s le premier soir alors que la terrasse √©tait vide. Visiblement nos shorts ne lui ont pas plu.

reviews.text:
Cuisine fine et recherch√©e , l√©g√®re et diversifi√©e
Tr√®s belle carte de vins √©galement
Personnel charmant et attentionn√© , professionnel √©galement
reviews.title: Un moment de s√©r√©nit√© et de calme en fin de jour ee

reviews.text:
Cet endroit est absolument magnifique. La terrasse se trouve au dessus de l‚Äôeau et la vue est grandiose sur la rive oppos√©e du ‚ÄòCanale Della Giudecca‚Äô. Au soleil couchant c‚Äôest enchanteur.. 

La nourriture y est excellente et le service parfait. En revanche pas accessible √† toutes les bourses. 

La carte des vins est √©norme mais la √©galement, pas donn√©e.. 

Somme toute √† recommander. Nous y retournerons √† notre prochain passage.
reviews.title: Ou comment terminer votre journ√©e en beaut√©?

reviews.text: We were looking for a restaurant for a romantic dinner in Venice.  The atmosphere, location, views, tale and wine all met my expectations.  We had just sailed up the Dalmatian Coast and have been eating fish for a week, so wanted a traditional Italian pasta restaurant.  Unfortunately, this was not it.  We thought about leaving, however before doing so I shared with the waiter what we were looking for...  they totally accommodated our wishes for a rocket salad + pasta that was not on the menu.  It was all very good.  Their Somm guided us on a great bottle of red wine and we had a wonderful romantic dinner.  In the end it was also priced economically for what we ordered...
reviews.title: Excellent Service, Views, Wine and Listened to our Request!

reviews.text:
The location offers an alternative view of Venice from the pontoon. Even on less favourable days the interior is welcoming and comfortable.
The food is seasonal and a different interpretation on produce available locally. The prices reflect the care and attention to detail in each dish. 
Wine available by the glass is high quality and offers a rare opportunity to taste regional wines. Diners can be guided by the staff to food and wine matches outside of the norm in Venice. 
The staff are knowledgeable and provide the right balance of information and attention to the solo diner to make the experience memorable.
reviews.title: Indulgence

reviews.text: Llegamos a este restaurante por casualidad, ibamos sin rumbo en una ciudad repleta de gente de carnaval. Al ver la terraza nos quedamos encantadas y decidimos comer all√≠. Sab√≠amos que iba a ser caro pero el sitio nos encant√≥ a primera vista. Todo cambi√≥ cuando nos sentamos y nadie nos hizo caso en casi media hora. Pasaban, nos miraban, asentian con la cabeza y seguian su camino. Nos trajeron las cartas, pedimos y a esperar de nuevo....tanto con los entrantes como con los platos. La comida escasa y no vale lo que pagamos por ella...que fue mucho.  No volveremos jam√°s.
reviews.title: Fatal.

reviews.text: Recommended by our hotel,  this is the best restaurant we found in Venice.  We LOVE good food and great wine, but not extravagant pricing.  The Lineadombra has a fantastic wine list.  (Wine Spectator Award of Excellence Winner)  Many times a restaurant with this vast scope of wine inventory will have thought out wines at the lower price points.  (Alas not always!)  This was the case here.  I ordered a great bottle of white wine from the Veneto region recommended by the sommelier for 40 Euro.  They had excellent wines by the glass as well.  The food was OUTSTANDING!  This is a predominantly seafood restaurant, and both my wife and myself had 4 fish dishes that were exemplary.  There were other non nautical selections on the menu, we just did not sample them.  We did have both a red wine and white wine by the glass that were very very good.  All of our meals in Venice this trip were very good, not our usual experience.  We also enjoyed Osteria da Fiore which we always enjoy when in Venice.  It too is excellent, but Lineadombra is our new favorite.  Dinning right on/next to the Giudecca Canal was a beautiful plus.
reviews.title: Best Restaurant We Experienced in our Wonderful Week in Venice!

reviews.text: D√©couvert par hasard au d√©tour de la Pointe de Dogana, l'emplacement nous a s√©duit : terrasse en bois pos√©e sur l'eau face √† Guidecca √† l'ombre parfaite des parasols. Le restaurant n'est pas donn√©, mais on en a pour son argent. Cuisine tr√®s soign√©e tant dans la pr√©sentation que pour les papilles. Service tr√®s attentionn√©  sans √™tre du tout pesant particuli√®rement agr√©able et sympathique. Une adresse plaisir √† recommander.
reviews.title: Un moment de plaisir

reviews.text:
I had big expectations of this restaurant but unfortunately we all (4 persons) didn't like our meals (each of us had a different meal). So unfortunately for us it was first a long walk to this restaurant and then the food was not good and it was also too pricey.
The service and the view from the terrace was however excellent.
reviews.title: Didn't like the food

reviews.text:
Ho pranzato oggi per la prima volta in questo ristorante. La terrazza sulla laguna √® veramente bella.

Il personale √® gentile e disponibile.

reviews.title: Vista meravigliosa

reviews.text: Certainement parmi les plus belles terrasses √† Venise....bien situ√©e. Accueil chaleureux et sympathique. La prise de la commande est tr√®s rapide et c‚Äôest apr√®s que √ßa se g√¢te.... Le temps d‚Äôattente est hallucinant....dommage car les plats sont excellents. La dur√©e de l‚Äôattente n‚Äôest heureusement pas proportionnelle √† la cuisson des p√¢tes qui sont d√©licieusement ¬´¬†al dente ¬ª. En dehors de cet inconv√©nient, l‚Äôendroit est √† recommander.
reviews.title: Molto buono, terrazza bella....ma lento lento....

reviews.text:
Being in Venice for my partners birthday week, we had passed this restaurant several times, not till the last day did we explore and book for our last night's dinner.

A very good choice, wonderful almost magical atmosphere, sitting on a pier jutting out into the  Giudecca waterway, as the light failed, with the water traffic still plying by, we were treated to a superb meal, served well by very friendly, very well trained staff.

We shared a starter of Globe Artichoke with Burrata, a soft Italian cheese, topped with black truffle and a tomato and paprika condiments. Our mains were a shared whole turbot, expertly filleted while we watched.

A very extensive wine list, though be warned, I did see one bottle marked up at 11000 Euros, yes 11 thousand, not a typo. Cr√®me Brulee, which was delicious but the Tiramisu was disappointing. Two glasses of a really nice Eiswein and then two double expresso coffees finished the evening and our holiday.
reviews.title: What a purfect way to end a birthday weeks holiday

reviews.text:
Tr√®s jolie cadre, paysage de r√™ve.
Plat bien pr√©sent√© mais prix exorbitant.
155‚Ç¨ pour 2 plats, 1 bouteille de Prosecco. 2 desserts et 2 caf√©, 
Personnel tr√®s charmant et souriant 
Bonne adresse mais trop cher
reviews.title: Bon produit mais tr√®s cher

reviews.text: I came to Venice for a few days to celebrate my 50th birthday and this is where we ate on our last night.  It was absolutely wonderful.  All the staff were superb - attentive without being over bearing and the food was absolutely fantastic.  I had scallops to start, then ravioli and finally liver and onions, my husband had mackerel, ravioli and then a veal chop.  It was all delicious and whilst the portions were not huge we were more than full by the time we had scrapped our plates clean.  We were sat at a corner table of the terrace with an amazing view along the canal.  It was a beautiful spot and a perfect end to our holiday in Venice.  The restaurant was only about 50 yards from our gorgeous hotel (Ca Maria Adele) which made rolling back to the room very easy.  I would not hesitate to recommend this restaurant to anyone staying in Venice - it is a magical spot.  Also whilst it is not cheap, we are from London and it was certainly no more expensive than eating out there.
reviews.title: A Perfect End to a Perfect holiday

reviews.text:
Oui, bien s√ªr c'est cher: on approche facilement les 100‚Ç¨ par personne. Mais on le sait avant d'entrer, en lisant la carte. 
Mais... Le lieu est superbe (je parle de la terrasse sur l'eau, table au bord). L'√Æle de la Giudecca, √©clair√©e par le soleil du soir, puis ses lumi√®res, les bateaux... 
Et aussi... Le service au petit soin et tr√®s sympathique 
Et encore... Les plats (pas tr√®s copieux mais corrects) sont raffin√©s, avec des saveurs subtiles.
Bref, nous √©tions venus il y a 5 ans, et nous reviendrons encore!

reviews.text:
Having a stroll around Venice can be daunting with the number of places to eat to choose from , but i can highly recommend a little walk outside of the normal tourist area to come to this place .

The staff are friendly and welcoming and the menu although small has an amazing selection you just want to try everything
Great place to go have an Aperol Spritz and plates of good food and watch the world walk and float past ...depending on your view lol

Le sommelier nous invite √† boire une bouteille locale, Bressan, monoc√©page Schioppettino, d√©licieux, vin tr√®s √©pic√©, avec des ar√¥mes de poivre. Je conseille ce flacon de 2012, 50 euros. arredamento moderno che si distacca completamente dalla maggior parte dei ristoranti veneziani, servizio ottimo e sempre gentili. Men√π sofisticato e carta dei vini di alto livello. Porzioni buone per un ristorante di questa categoria (ossia alta).

Pasta with langoustine for the main course was ok. The server was dragging her feet, making noise with her sleepers, chewing gum or food, and not showing interest.
