reviews.text: Cena con gruppo di amici e famiglie. 30 persone. Mangiato poco, maluccio perch√© ci siamo fidati del "faccio io del proprietario" e pagato una pazzia, ma veramente tanto, oltre 45 euro a testa. I gruppi non sono per questo posto. Non consiglio.
reviews.title: Peccato aveva una buona nomea

reviews.text:
Cela pourrait √™tre un bon moment...mais, car il y a un mais, incarn√© par cette petite dame acari√¢tre qui donne imm√©diatement le tempo.
Elle sourit en se br√ªlant c'est sur, et elle traite les clients comme les pigeons...qui la d√©range...aussi.
Le repas quand √† lui, sans reliefs, mais pas mauvais, c'est d√©j√† √ßa.
reviews.title: Bof

reviews.text: Polenta e schie, super. Folpetti e spaghetti al nero, ottimi. Molto buoni anche i calamari fritti. La pizza √® per turisti stranieri, non male. Aggiungi due bottiglie d'acqua, un quarto di tocai e un caff√®. Totale 80 euro. Posto accogliente, servizio cortese, tempi d'attesa pi√π che buoni. Consigliato!
reviews.title: Ci torneremo!

reviews.text:
Voil√†, il faut faire attention... Nous nous trouvons entre Arsenale et Giardina. Il y a une rue qui est moins touristique qu'au centre de Venise... Et il y a un restaurant apr√®s l'autre. Certains sont pleins, d'autres sont vides... Cherchez pourquoi!
Giorgione est excellent. La terrasse est pleine, donc r√©servez √† l'avance... Les serveurs sont efficaces quoiqu'ils sourient trop peu pour des Italiens... Mais la nourriture est d√©licieuse, et le chef ou le  patron qui ne d√©ride pas, s'√©clate √† la guitare. Il ne fait pas l'aum√¥ne, il ne demande rien mais adore chanter. Je recommande hautement les plats "fait-maison", la meilleure lasagne du si√®cle... Le vin est simple et bon, les desserts √©galement.
reviews.title: un des derniers endroits v√©n√©tiens

reviews.text:
Das war die schlechteste Pizza Italiens die je gebacken wurde. Geraspelt Karotten ist ein no go.
Getr√§nke ohne Gl√§ser...
reviews.title: Langes Warten Pizza hart

reviews.text: Vi spiste aftensmad her den sidste aften i vores ferie og spiste kalvek√∏d i vinsauce og hertil grillede gr√∏ntsager og tartufo is til dessert. Vi drak en halv flaske mousserende hvidvin af husets samt en flaske vand til en samlet pris af 70 euro, hvilket er en rimelig pris i Venedig. Maden var velsmagende og der var en hyggelig stemning. Ejeren kom ud p√• aftenen ud og spillede guitar og sang til s√• alle sang med :-)
reviews.title: Hyggeligt autentisk italiensk k√∏kken

reviews.text:
We came here for lunch two weeks ago and for dinner tonight. I can confirm that the fish risotto is amazing!! We also had an ‚Äúantipasto‚Äù plate with boiled fish and it was delicious. Fish is fresh. 
Highly recommended!!
reviews.title: Best fish risotto in town

reviews.text: Una cena fant√°stica con actuaci√≥n musical incluida. Una pasta muy rica, tanto los spaghetti alla busara con scampi (con langotinos y una salsa de tomate con un liger√≠simo toque picante) como los spaghetti carbonara. Ambos los acompa√±amos con una cerveza y 1/2 litro de vino blanco, y de postre tiramis√∫. Todo por 50 euros. Adem√°s la cena amenizada con un se√±or (creemos que el due√±o) cantando con su guitarra. Una cena muy agradable y un lugar totalmente recomendable
reviews.title: Cena y m√∫sica

reviews.text:
Bonne cuisine familiale et super ambiance dans un quartier authentique loin du tourisme de masse.
Nous avons pris un menu √† 15,50‚Ç¨, bon et copieux! Les serveurs sont tr√®s sympas et efficaces et le patron et la patronne ont chant√©, guitare en main ainsi que des clients, super ambiance v√©nitienne authentique! Nous avions d√©j√† appr√©ci√© hier et cette soir√©e a confirm√© notre premi√®re impression. Nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir! Bravo et merci! Gracie mille!
reviews.title: Extra! Excellent rapport qualit√©-prix!

reviews.text: Non √® la prima volta che ci vado. Si √® confermato come uno dei posti con miglior rapporto qualit√†/prezzo a venezia. I piatti veneziani sono perfetti, come da ricetta tradizionale. Materia prima fresca, ottima esecuzione. Il baccal√† mantecato non l‚Äôavevano, perch√© lo fanno al pomeriggio. L‚Äôantipasto era ottimo (i folpetti in particolare!). Il risotto di pesce super! Il prezzo, onesto. Racconandato.
reviews.title: Risotto di pesce perfetto

reviews.text: In Venedig gut essen ist sowieso schwierig. Also bin ich milde gestimmt. Aber ein Restaurant ohne Weinkarte ... die Speisekarte so wie hunderte Speisekarten in Venedig halt sind ...
reviews.title: ... geht so.

reviews.text: Not the best place to eat...when me and my mom went to sit down outside (we were the only ones there) they didn't want to serve us because we only wanting a drink and when we went to leave they said it was fine. We did go ahead and order a cheese platter with our wine, which was very good and quick but service was poor! We weren't in a hurry but when asking for the check our waitress said she'd be back in 2 minutes but that turned into 20, of her walking around smoking or shopping. Then she didn't give us the correct change back on a bill she had already added the tip on but we didn't say anything because we just wanted to leave at that point. Though the cheese platter and wine was good, service and attitude makes us not want to eat here again nor recommend this place.
reviews.title: Good food, bad good service

reviews.text: We had dinner with the family at that place. ordinary tourist food, bad wine. We will never come back.
reviews.title: Never again

reviews.text:
Si proprio una serata spensierata!
Tutto ok, buono il cibo, buono il servizio, buona la compagnia!
Tutto accompagnato da della buona e bella musica veneziana, cantata dal vivo dal proprietario e amico.
Hanno cantato anche una delle cameriere e una ragazza che era li, bravissime.
Bravi continuate cosi ci torneremo certamente
reviews.title: Serata spensierata

reviews.text:
Spettacolo nel vero senso della parola..  Buon pesce,  piatti locali,  e canzoni venete cantate divinamente da Lucio! 
Se volete passare una bella serata in compagnia e divertirvi,  andate in questo ristorante. 
Al lato pratico: piatti non troppo raffinati(si predilige la bonta all'occhio), pesce buono e saporito(nello specifico sottolineo la pulizia delle vongole come eccellente).  Risotto gustosi. Primi in generale buoni! 
Andate!
reviews.title: Un vero spettacolo!

reviews.text: Una sola stella perch√© meno non √® possibile.... Si mangia male e si beve peggio... Un vino della casa proposto come prosecco, servito nella brocca... caldo....imbevibile... 18 euro!!!! Un antipasto misto mare mediocre, senza sapore, non cucinato... 16 euro!!!!!!!! Uno spaghetto al nero di seppia scotto.... 15 euro!!!!!!!!!!! Si salva solo la location, ma in via Garibaldi ogni altro locale √® sicuramente meglio!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.title: Peggio di cos√¨......

reviews.text: sono stata il 2 giugno a pranzo, finalmente un ristorante con la vera cucina tipica veneziana. Ogni cosa aveva il suo sapore, e tutto era squisito. Non vedo l'ora di ritornare
reviews.title: una piacevole scoperta

reviews.text:
Restaurant avec une d√©coration sympa. 
Les plats ne sont pas excellents (m√™me pour des p√¢tes) et ils sont surtout chers. 45‚Ç¨ pour deux plats de p√¢tes ainsi qu‚Äôun spritz et 25cl de vin blanc ...
reviews.title: A √©viter

reviews.text: Qualit√© moyenne, prix √©lev√©. Les p√¢tes √©taient certes bonnes mais plus de 16‚Ç¨ le plat, pour seulement des p√¢tes il ne faut pas non plus exag√©rer.. A √©viter, surtout quand l'on se rend compte qu'un "turistico menu" est propos√©. Clairement attrape-touriste
reviews.title: Prix √©lev√©s pour une qualit√© moyenne

reviews.text: My wife and I first went here for dinner 8 years ago and loved the guitar playing. this time around it was busy but cozy. The staff were great and the food outstanding.
reviews.title: A truly lovely place

reviews.text:
Ambiente semplice ed accogliente, familiare. Cucina casalinga  buona che rispetta la tradizione veneziana.  Personale simpatico e sorridente, professionalit√† alta.
 Titolare extra e...cantante trascinante.  Bravissimi Lucio e Chicca!!!  
 Il costo √® giusto.
reviews.title: gita di gruppo user

reviews.text:
Un ristorante a via Garibaldi senza troppe pretese che offre una buona e semplice cucina veneziana a prezzi onestissimi.
Abbiamo cenato in questo ristorante prenotando per 20 persone, ci siamo trovati benissimo. Il personale  √® stato sempre molto disponibile, ci ha proposto il men√π a base di Spaghetti alle vongole, per secondo buona frittura di pesce con la polenta. Da consigliare assolutamente!
reviews.title: lo spaghetto alle vongole migliore di via Garibaldi e non solo

reviews.text:
Premesso che a Venezia essere truffati, ahim√®, √® praticamente garantito.
Quando trovi un locale che sa fare una dignitosa frittura mista (calamari e scampi) e delle sarde in saor pi√π che buone, devi sentirti fortunato. Capisco le recensioni negative ma non si pu√≤ non considerare il contesto di Venezia (che √® un posto folle dove locali indegni possono fare incassi da capogiro solamente per il numero incredibile di turisti).
Dunque, questo locale dove vanno ancora i veneziani e che fa alcuni piatti pi√π che apprezzabili a me √® sembrato un oasi nel deserto. Simpatico anche il gestore che prende la chitarra e canta con passione. Forse per√≤ abbiamo apprezzato perch√© lui era dentro il locale e noi fuori.
reviews.title: A Venezia ... sei fortunato se trovi un posto cos√¨

reviews.text:
The trattoria looks very traditional from the outside, which attracted us to it. Initially it was a very quiet restaurant with only a few couples in there, but then a large tour group arrived and it was packed. 

The food was ok, but could have been better. The serving staff were neither attentive or friendly. Prawns were not as fresh as they should have been.
reviews.title: Not bad, but had better

reviews.text:
P√¢te sans int√©r√™t, trop salee
Milanese caoutchouteuse

Patron et serveuse pas sympa, toujours sur notre dos

Pourtant m'avait √©t√© recommand√©e par une v√©nitienne !

Das Essen toll, das Ambiente nett und der Service zuvorkommend. Ein unvergesslicher Abend mit Musik und Tanz.
Diesen Abend am 29.3 kann nur als einmalig beschrieben werden. Zuf√§llig ergab es sich, das drei G√§ste Geburstag
hatten. Sig. Lucio w√ºrdigte eine jede auf seine Weise! Mit seiner Gitarre und seiner Stimme.

reviews.text: Poor. Mediocre food. Over priced and charged for items either not received or not asked for. Exactly the kind of place we were warned about. Thankfully other more positive eating experiences meant this didn't tarnish the whole Venetian experience for us!

Ambiente piacevole e personale cortese.. con musica dal vivo anni 80..consiglieremo con piacere il Vostro ristorante a amici e parenti! Grazie!

reviews.text: locale coinvolgente molto.... ci sono artisti veraci..... ottimo per farsi amici anche tra gli altri clienti!!!!!!

name: VinoVino Wine Bar
address: Ponte delle Veste, 2007/a, 30124 Venice Italy

reviews.text: We ate there 3 times during our stay in Venice, as it was around the corner from our hotel and the food was fabulous.  The merangue dessert with amaretto is my new favorite dessert!  The staff was attentive an the atmosphere in the garden and out front are both lovely.
reviews.title: Wonderful place, great food, reasonable prices.

reviews.text:
Un d√©jeuner agr√©able. 
Dans une petite cours √† l‚Äôarri√®re du restaurant, tr√®s au calme, agr√©able avec de la vigne pour parasol. Donc de la verdure sous le soleil de plomb. D√©jeuner poissons du jour en petite friture avec des l√©gumes. Tr√®s bon . Salade de poulpe, tr√®s bon , poulpe tendre . Tr√®s correct pour cette petite halte .

reviews.text: Tivemos um jantar muito agrad√°vel. Pedimos pizza e estava muito boa. O atendimento foi muito bom tamb√©m.
reviews.title: Jantar muito agrad√°vel.

reviews.text: We hebben hier heerlijk gegeten, buitenkant lijkt het heel klein maar binnen hebben ze o.a. een schitterende binnen tuin. Veel ambiance lekker eten ! En lekkere lambrusco üòç
reviews.title: Lekker eten

reviews.text:
A warm welcome from lovely staff. The food was stunning and a good price. Beautiful setting and atmosphere and great service. We were attracted to the restaurant by the entrance from Teatro La Fenice side. See photos of how beautiful it looks.
The beer was good as were the Bellini's. The desserts were incredible also.
reviews.title: Loved it! Would definately re-visit

reviews.text: The prices posted on menu outside the door compared to neighboring restaurants were far more reasonable.  We entered off the Piazza and went to the inside patio.  I ordered the fish it was Fantastic.  Our waiter was very efficient and friendly though not overly chatty.  Another older waiter seemed to be entertaining a large group on the patio and anyone else who would listen.  Other reviews complained about the wait to get the bill though we specifically asked and it came quickly both visits.  Our second night we came in through the alley/ walk way and were seated inside did not recognize it as the same restaurant until we walked around a corner. (Quite a large place) the inside is cozy, dark woods and red curtains.  Again the food was good one pasta one beef meal though not memorable as the fish was a couple nights prior.  We didn't have any mystery charges. Small gratuity was added but it is marked on the menu.
reviews.title: Two entrances - inside and outside seem like different restaurants

reviews.text:
We have been to Venice on many occasions.. mostly all in January simply because we like the winter quiet of Venice ...
We got in from Amsterdam late and we‚Äôre on our way to another restaurant but my husband was tired and said ..why don‚Äôt we just go in here ... ok ..bad move! 
Waiter and manager were somewhat uninterested in the fact that we were customers! Once seated our waiter ..upon thinking we just wanted wine became even less interested...but after understanding that we wanted dinner was slightly more attentive. 
We ordered: mixed salad which came with a gelatinous dressing , then my husbands red sauce on his pasta had some unrecognizable spice which I had never had in all my Italian travels! My pasta  with cream sauce, ham and a few mushrooms was edible .. 
we paid our bill and left . 
There are so many really wonderful restaurants and places to eat on any type of budget in Venice I‚Äôm SURE anyone can find someplace better with a more welcoming attitude than this establishment!
reviews.title: Skip this place

reviews.text: the food was delicious the service wasn‚Äôt great. not very friendly the waiter that we had. the atmosphere was nice.
reviews.title: good

reviews.text: Average food, no service and mystery charges that almost double your bill.  Cover charges in Venice are for food, bread and/or service - this place offers none of these.  We waited 15-20 minutes just to get our bill.  With 1000 places to eat in Venice, anywhere is better than here.
reviews.title: Avoid - rip off!!

We walked around the corner to Al Theatro and they were so lovely,  welcoming and friendly

reviews.text: Excelente, pre√ßo justo, bons vinhos e lugar aconchegante. Recomendo demais indo a casal com fam√≠lia e equipe atende super bem .

reviews.text: Nella norma, ha un potenziale alto con location al lato del teatro la fenice, in un quartiere super figo di Venezia...ma a parte il cameriere molto gentile e professionale per il resto tutto nella norma, senza exploit di piacere e emozione che un buon locale potrebbe dare. Manca di cura dei dettagli

reviews.text: La comida correcta. La camarera un poco seca. El problema es que cuando est√°bamos ya pagando, se le calleron unas consumiciones  de limoncello encima de mi padre. Le cal√≥ el jersey, pantal√≥n y cazadora y ni se disculp√≥ correctamente. Dijo lo siento y sigui√≥ sirviendo como si nada. El jersey era muy delicado y ha quedado estropeado.

reviews.text:
Good service, fine wine, tasty food in a location fairly close to the opera house.

Fairly informal setting
reviews.title: Great dinner location

reviews.text: This was recommended by our hotel.  Solid Pizza and delicious wines at very good prices!  We ate here twice!
reviews.title: Pizza Pasta Prosecco!

reviews.text: My husband and I spent our 5th anniversary at this fantastic restaurant in Venice. Extremely friendly service, the server Marco made our night! The sea bass and lamb chops are out of this world. Marco paired our wine perfectly. The tiramisu was the cherry on top!
reviews.title: Wine and dine!

reviews.text:
Un restaurant recommand√© par l'h√¥tel qui est sans grand inter√™t quand aux plats communs propos√©s qui de surcroit n'apportent pas le rendu attendu par rapport au prix.
En clair c'est cher pour ce qui est donn√© dans l'assiette m√™me si le cadre √† l'entour et le th√©√¢tre de la Fenice sont agr√©ables.
Les sarde in saor, qui est le plat v√©nitien propos√© par excellence, ne m'a pas s√©duit, ni m√™me le foie avec la polenta, voir le poulet au curry (√©trange).
Un bon point toutefois pour le Baccala mantecato t√©s √©quilibr√© et agr√©able en bouche pour des saveurs int√©ressantes.

reviews.text:
We found this in passing but happy to recommend to fellow travellers. It‚Äôs tucked away down a side street and you simply wouldn‚Äôt find it by walking past. We looked at the menu of the more formal and far more expensive other side if the establishment, and the Maitre D saw our grimace and said to check out the other side. Walking through to the walled garden was a great surprise.  The garden is beautiful with some interesting features. 

We had a a huge salad with a wonderful dressing, and bowls of pasta. I had the best spaghetti carbonara I‚Äôve ever had! The pizzas at the next table looked delicious and not a morsel was left.
reviews.title: Fabulous lunch

reviews.text: We ended up eating here twice which is quite unusual as we like to try out new places. Excellent lasagne and generous portions of delicious food in a truly lovely tranquil setting. Open late after the La Fenice performance too!

reviews.text: We ate here twice during our stay.  The food was wonderful and the service was great.  The lasagna was amazing and the pizza was delicious
reviews.title: Amazing food in the wonderful garden room

reviews.text: Lugnt st√§lle trots n√§rheten till turiststr√•ket. God pasta funghi och gratinerad aubergine. Det f√∂reslagna r√∂dvinet utm√§rkt och v√§nliga servit√∂rer. Den dam som tog betalt hade d√§remot en lite s√§mre dag , kanske pga vi ville betala med kort!

reviews.text: This restaurant serves authentic Venetian food. Highly recommended. If you‚Äôre lucky you may hear people being serenaded on a Gondola!

reviews.text: I had clocked this place as I walked past it earlier in the day and registered that it was open until late (11.30) and advertised itself as having an outside space to sit in. Perfect, I thought, I'll go there after the opera tonight. I arrived at 10.50 and was met with something close to an eye roll from the maitre d', who also said it was not possible to sit outside at this hour. I deliberately chose and ordered fast, and chose dishes I knew could be prepared and served quickly. Melon with Parma ham followed by spaghetti carbonara. The food arrived quickly and was tasty - and in just the right quantity. The female staff member who brought me my food did her best to be friendly, but seemed to be going through the motions. I decided to skip dessert and coffee and just have an after dinner drink and the bill. The lady said that to use my card I had to come with her to the cash desk. She seemed to think 'now' but agreed that could finish my drink first. 30 seconds later a male colleague appeared and tried to take me to the cash desk. I asked if I could finish my drink first. By now it was just about 11.30. He pretty much said OK through gritted teeth and then hovered conspicuously, watching me have my drink. At one point he disappeared to switch off the music, before coming back. As I was paying, I couldn't help but notice that in the upmarket sister restaurant in the next room, people were still lingering, some of them still seated outside. I guess you get what you pay for, and money buys you a friendlier experience. If they were that pressed for time, I would rather they said, sorry we're closed (and didn't advertise a late closing time), in which case I would have got a takeaway pizza from my friendly local bar and taken it back to my hotel's terrace. It's a shame because the food was good, and, for this part of Venice, reasonably priced!
reviews.title: Good food, good value, let down by poor service

reviews.text: Wir waren gestern in diesem wundervollen Restaurant Abendessen und es war mehr als exquisit. Das Personal sehr bem√ºht und zuvorkommend, das Essen eine wahrhafte Gaumenfreude. Ob Vorspeise Hauptspeisen oder das extrem leckere Tiramisu als Abschluss- alles in allem 5 Sterne gerecht. Wir kommen sehr gerne wieder

reviews.text: Niente da dire sulla location, completamente incantevole. Infatti √® stato scelto per un pranzo molto speciale. Questo per√≤ non vuol dire che il servizio o cibo pu√≤ andare in secondo piano. Il nostro pesce era completamente blando e addirittura uno del gruppo ha dovuto mandare indietro il suo piatto visto che al interno il pesce era completamente crudo. Pu√≤ succedere. Quello che non deve succedere per√≤ √® che uno si trova davanti il cameriere che riporta il piatto dicendo che doveva essere cos√¨! Ma stiamo scherzando? Solo perch√© stranieri, non vuol dire che le persone non sanno mangiare. Si trattava pure della sposa! Non c'√® stato nessuno sforzo a rendere un po' speciale questo pranzo nonostante tutto l'iter precedente. Anzi! Ed eravamo solo in quattro! Un gran peccato.
reviews.title: Totale delusione

reviews.text: We got married in Venice and chose this restaurant for our intimate wedding lunch due to its good reviews and its location, right on the Grand Canal. I booked weeks in advance and was required to provide my credit card details to secure the booking. When we arrived, the waiter didn‚Äôt seem to be expecting us, but feigned knowledge of the booking. We were not told that they were only serving a set lunch menu rather than a la carte, so choices were rather limited. My husband & I both chose fish for our main course - his was cooked, mine was not. When I pointed this out and asked for a replacement, the waiter took it away and apologised. The Head Waiter then came out and insisted that mine was cooked- it was not. I refused it and eventually they brought me an alternative meal which I ate long after my guests had finished theirs. We were given free coffees but, given that this was a special occasion and that they were not even very busy, the quality of the food and service was extremely disappointing. I could have chosen any other restaurant in Venice for my wedding lunch; I chose l‚ÄôAlcova, but they didn‚Äôt seem to care. This spoilt what should have been a very special occasion.
reviews.title: Very poor service

reviews.text: Went here for special birthday dinner. We got the 3 courses for ‚Ç¨50 special dinner. Most of the food was absolutely delicious however a couple of dishes were just ok and I‚Äôd say we‚Äôve eaten better in Italy. Service however was excellent and the location was beautiful! The Bellini's were also excellent however ‚Ç¨16 each so beware! üò≥ Definitely worry it though!

Esperienza sublime in tutte le sue forme, non ultima quella gastronomica. Tutto perfetto...veramente una serata da favola.

reviews.text: The food here is excellent. You can sit outside on the side of the Grand Canal or inside at elegant tables. If you want to sit outside you do need to book as there are not many tables and it is very popular. The food and wines were very good. We particularly enjoyed the fish. It was simply presented and cooked perfectly. The breads are made by the chef and were interesting. They were the best breads we had anywhere in Venice.

reviews.text: A restaurant located in a five star hotel, L‚ÄôAlcova will not disappoint. Apart from its delectable meals, L‚ÄôAlcova offers multi-sensory experiences for visitors who want to immerse themselves in Italian cuisine, such as visiting the Rialto market with the chef, a tailor-made cooking class and eating and helping out in the kitchen. For those visitors who would prefer to enjoy a quiet meal, L‚ÄôAlcova offers a beautiful terrace with incredible views and an equally spectacular dining room. Their dishes are both meat and fish-based and naturally there is no shortage of pasta.
reviews.title: Delectable meals

I primi erano abbastanza buoni e serviti con porzioni nella media. Il conto pari a 147 euro lo trovo in linea con le medie locali. Le riserve le esprimo per i servizi igienici che sono assolutamente inadatti ad un locale che esercita servizi di ristorazione. Da migliorare ...

reviews.text:
Our host recommended this ¬´¬†traditional¬†¬ª restaurant ran by an Italian family. What a mistake we‚Äôve made! Everything is too salty: the bread (not tasty at all, too dry), the pasta with mushrooms and truffle (does not worth the price), the pizza... We feel like we have been fooled...
I really do not recommend this place.

reviews.text:
I miei amici ed io abbiamo deciso di cenare in questo locale dopo aver guardato la partita della nostra squadra del cuore e purtroppo si √® rivelata una pessima scelta. Abbiamo ordinato dei fritti misti come antipasto, veramente penosi, sembravano essere di parecchi giorni prima e cucinati in un olio scadente. I club sandwich (se si possono definire tali) erano super bruciati, quasi carbonizzati e dentro di ingredienti non c'era praticamente nulla, le pizze invece sembravano essere fatte di cartone. Ma la cosa che ci ha fatto arrabbiare di pi√π √® stata quando abbiamo fatto notare al ragazzo in sala che i club sandwich erano carbonizzati, lui ci ha risposto che erano stati fatti cos√¨ appositamente per esaltarne il gusto.
Ah dimenticavo, come se non bastasse la sala rosa era davvero acida. Solitamente non scrivo recensioni negative ai locali ma questa volta era strettamente necessario. Indecenti, spero di non stare male! Consiglier√≤ questo locale al programma "Cucine da incubo".

reviews.text: Tornando dalla partita con amici decidiamo di mangiare qualcosa tutti assieme...Non lo avessimo mai fatto: fritti pessimi fatti in olio palesemente vecchio, club sandwich (??) imbarazzanti e carbonizzati fatti senza una logica serviti con salsa rosa acida (probabilmente avariata), pizze peggio di quelle surgelate del supermercato. Faccio notare ad un dipendente il pessimo aspetto (e gusto) del mio club sandwich e lui mi risponde dicendo che era volutamente bruciato per esaltarne i sapori. Mai mangiato cos√¨ male in vita mia. Children‚Äôs Pizza s were good but husband and I choose fish (everyone said eat seafood in Venice) . Tasteless at best it was so disappointing I had one mouthful of prawns and left the rest. 

Food in Venice varies hugely both in price and quality. Try somewhere else and if you do eat here stick to pizza.

Apr√®s avoir √©t√© accueilli de mani√®re scandaleuse, il nous a √©t√© servi des frites froides( trop peu) non sal√©es et d√©gueulasses accompagn√©es d'une viande s√®che et sans sauce ! Trop cuite √©videmment.
Lorsque nous demandons du ketchup il r√©torquent qu'ils n'en ont pas or nous les avions vu pr√©c√©demment cacher les pots de sauce.
Je d√©conseille √† tout le monde!

After being scandalously welcomed, we were served cold (too little) unsalted and disgusting fries accompanied by dry meat and without sauce!  Overcooked, of course.

When we ask for ketchup they say they don't have any, but we had seen them hide the sauce pots before.

reviews.text:
Went in for a few drinks to watch Champions League game.
One of the waiters made out he was a Liverpool fan, but I'm not so sure.
In any case, the waiting staff were friendly and didn't bug us to buy drinks, but were there when we wanted them. 
WiFi was good for those not so interesting bits.
The food looked decent but we had already eaten.
reviews.title: Champions League game

reviews.text: Cheap restaurant with a nice service, one of the best services we had in Venice. (pizza: daviola and ham&cheese)

Siamo stati in 6 con coupon di Groupon e ci siamo trovati molto bene .
Poco distante da San Marco e Rialto.
Pizza buona , ben farcita e anche ottimo antipasto.
Consiglio
reviews.title: Ottima pizza

reviews.text: Il mio ragazzo ha insistito per portarmi in questo ristorante dopo che lui lo aveva conosciuto circa 5 anni fa... che dire? Assolutamente oltre le aspettative: cibo buonissimo e pesce fresco e di qualit√†, primi piatti da 5 stelle ed ottimo il servizio! Ultima cosa, non per importanza, rapporto qualit√†/prezzo eccezionale! Ci torneremo senza alcun dubbio! Consigliatissimo!
reviews.title: Ci torneremo assolutamente!

reviews.text:
Questo locale, vicinissimo a San Marco, una volta caratteristico per un arredamento a panconi di legno, offriva senza pretese una pizza di fine settimana od un minimo di men√π cucina, con la cura del cliente affezionato: era ottimo per il dopo cinema e si riusciva anche a sopportare con pazienza le partite di calcio imposte con schermi 1 metro per 1, visto il clima simpatico ed il prezzo giusto.
Tornati un sabato sera, dopo restauri alla sala principale che han fatto sparire i panconi tipici per un anonimo spatolato sul muro, sono cominciate le brutte sorprese. Vietato l'accesso alla saletta pi√π piccola, restata immutata e pi√π tranquilla, per non specificati motivi o meglio per raggruppare tutti da una parte e risparmiarsi fatica,  assicurandoci di una tranquillit√† che non c'√® stata grazie anche ad MTV a canna.
Prezzi lievitati anche se non di molto, pizze condite in modo striminzito, contorni da lente di ingrandimento, trattamento freddo e sbrigativo.
Come volevasi dimostrare, tipico del muro lucido, son bastate 2 tavole sopraggiunte, nemmeno molto rumorose, ed √® attaccato l'effetto rimbombo: da non sentire chi ci stava seduto vicino, ringraziando anche MTV. Mancavano mezzi dessert e quelli che c'erano a porzioni ridotte: non pi√π tre bign√® per il profiterol ma due...dobbiamo ripagarci il restauro, evidentemente. Perfino le due foglie di rucola ornamentali sul filetto erano contate.
Ma il peggio deve ancora arrivare: ordino una birra rossa, come da men√π, ma recandomi alla toilette, purtroppo alla fine della cena, li becco che fabbricano la rossa con un infima birra in lattina chiara miscelata con un po' di scura.
No comment.
C'√® da dire che un tempo era un impresa trovare una tavola, adesso sono vuoti: evidentemente non ero aggiornato.C'era una volta il Cliente veneziano, ora non interessa pi√π.
Sconsiglio vivamente.
reviews.title: Proprio peccato

reviews.text:
Sono stata in questo locale con il mio ragazzo, utilizzando un coupon acquistato su Groupon. L'offerta prevedeva un piccolo antipasto di mare, 1 kg di grigliata di pesce x 2, insalata e dolce. A volte prendendo offerte su Groupon non si pretende molto, invece la cena ci ha stupiti, √® stata molto buona. Il pesce era buonissimo e fresco. E il servizio ottimo, con il cameriere che gentilmente ci ha anche spinato e sporzionato la grigliata di pesce. Anche il tiramis√π buono!
Magari la prossima volta potremmo tornare per assaggiare i primi piattiüòÅ Davvero complimenti!
reviews.title: Una piacevole sorpresa

reviews.text:
Agr√©able soir√©e, personnel sympathique ! 
Nous avons r√©server un menu pizza + boisson sur Groupon pour 16,92‚Ç¨ pour deux! 
Arriver au restaurant, la r√©servation avait bien √©t√© prise en compte, nous avons eu le droit √† une assiette de frites, croquettes de pommes de terres et nuggets avec sauces, deux boissons soft, pizza et caf√© ! Bon rapport qualit√©/prix.
Je vous recommande a 100%, personnel tr√®s agr√©able, restaurant propre et beau!
reviews.title: Parfait

reviews.text:
Siamo state in questo locale sfruttando un groupon. 
Posto alla buona, pizza buona, pesce mangiabile. 
Antipasto misto fresco buono, mentre 

una parte della grigliata stopposa e  fredda. 
Dolce: meringata nn fatta in casa. 
Esposto c‚Äô√® un men√π fisso per la sera di carne o di pesce a 20 euro. 
Non lo definirei assolutamente un ristorante.
Non si mangiano piatti eccezionali, ma almeno non ti pelano con il conto!
Nn lo consiglio .

Ottimo servizio veloce , ottimo rapporto qualit√† prezzo. Location centrale e molto consigliata!
